<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.70%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:08.20%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(1)&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Includes net loss from early extinguishment of debt of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	$8.8 millio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	n and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	$4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	for fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	, respectively.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<EFX_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION>
<A NAME="FIS_MANAGEMENTS_DISCUSSION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Item 7.&nbsp;&nbsp;Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Overview
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Description of the Business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Sonic operates and franchises the largest chain of drive-in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	restaurants
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in the United States
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	August 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Sonic system was comprised of 3,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	557
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	drive-ins, of which 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% were Company Drive-Ins and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	90
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Franchise Drive-Ins.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As announced in the third quarter of fiscal year 2016, w
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e plan to move toward an approximately 95%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;franchised system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as part of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	refranchising initiative.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Sonic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	signature
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	food
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	items
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	include s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pecialty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	drinks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(such as cherry limeades and slushes), ice cream
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	desserts, made
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	-to-order
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	chicken
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sandwiches
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and hamburgers, a variety of hot dogs including six-inch premium beef hot dogs and footlong quarter pound coneys, hand-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	made
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	onion rings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	tater tots
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Sonic Drive-Ins also offer breakfast items that include a variety of breakfast
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	burritos and serve the full menu all day.&nbsp;&nbsp;We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	derive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	revenues primarily from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Drive-In sales and royalties from franchisees.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	also receive revenues from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	leasing real estate to franchisees,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	franchise fees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, earnings from minority investments in franchise operations and other miscellaneous revenues.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Company Drive-In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	revenues and expenses are directly affected by the number and sales volumes of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Company Drive-Ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	franchising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	revenues and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	other expenses such as depreciation, amortization and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	selling, general and administrative
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	expenses are affected by the number and sales volumes of Franchise Drive-Ins.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lease revenues are generated primarily by the leasing of land and buildings for Company Drive-In operations that have been sold to franchisees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Overview of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Business Performance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	System-wide same-store sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% during fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as compared to an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Same-store sales at Company Drive-Ins increased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% during fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as compared to an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Our continued positive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	same-store sales are a result of the successful implementation of initiatives, including product quality improvements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and innovation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, a greater emphasis on personalized service
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	new technology,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	tiered pricing strategy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and a media strategy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, that have set a solid foundation for growth.&nbsp;&nbsp;All of these initiatives drive Sonic&#x2019;s multi-layered growth strategy, which incorporates same-store sales growth, operating leverage, deployment of cash, an ascending royalty rate and new drive-in development.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ame-store sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	is the most important layer and drives operating leverage and increased operating cash flows.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Revenues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to $606.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	from $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	606.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fiscal year 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, which was primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	due to an increase in Franchise Drive-In royalties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.9&nbsp;million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, partially offset by a decrease in Company Drive-In sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of $10.2 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The decrease in Company Drive-In sales was a result of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	refranchising certain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Company Drive-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ns, offset by an increase in sales from increased same-store sales.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Restaurant margins at Company Drive-Ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	were unfavorable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	basis points during fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	reflecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased investments in employees&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to attract and retain employees at the drive-in level and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	impact of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	newly established Brand Technology
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Fund (&#x201C;BTF&#x201D;), partially offset by leverage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Net income and diluted earnings per share for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	were $64.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million and $1.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, respectively, as compared to net income of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	64.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million or $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;per diluted share for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Excluding the non
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#8209;GAAP adjustments further described below, net income per diluted share was $1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	29
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per diluted share in fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The following analysis of non-GAAP adjustments is intended to supplement the presentation of the Company&#x2019;s financial results in accordance with GAAP.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe the exclusion of these items in evaluating the change in net income and diluted earnings per share for the periods below provides useful information to investors and management regarding the underlying business trends and the performance of our ongoing operations and is helpful for period-to-period and company-to-company comparisons, which management believes will assist investors in analyzing the financial results for the Company and predicting future performance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;Numbers below are stated in thousands, except per share amounts.

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The following table provides information regarding the number of Company Drive-Ins and Franchise Drive-Ins operating as of the end of the years indicated as well as the system-wide change in sales and average unit volume.&nbsp;&nbsp;System-wide information includes both Company Drive-In and Franchise Drive-In information, which we believe is useful in analyzing the growth of the brand as well as the Company&#x2019;s revenues, since franchisees pay royalties based on a percentage of sales.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Drive-ins that are temporarily closed for various reasons (repairs, remodeling, relocations, etc.) are not considered closed unless the Company determines that they are unlikely to reopen within a reasonable time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	Represents percentage change for drive-ins open for a minimum of 15 months.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<EFX_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS>
<A NAME="FIS_RESULTS_OF_OPERATIONS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Results of Operations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Revenues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The following table sets forth the components of revenue for the reported periods and the relative change between the comparable periods.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">

<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:10.98%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:12.75PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;" NOWRAP="NOWRAP">
	3.5&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:01.90%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	%
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="8" VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:00.02%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Drive-ins that are temporarily closed for various reasons (repairs, remodeling, relocations, etc.) are not considered closed unless the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Company determines that they are unlikely to reopen within a reasonable time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Represents percentage change for drive-ins open for a minimum of 15 months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Same-store
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales for Company Drive-Ins increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, showing continued momentum from the Company&#x2019;s successful implementation of initiatives to improve product quality, service and val
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ue perception
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the fiscal fourth quarter, we experienced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	lower-than-expected traffic, reflecting lower consumer spending in the restaurant industry and aggressive competitive activity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;Company Drive-In sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	creased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	%, during fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compared to fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	change
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	was driven by a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17.3&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decrease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	related to drive-ins that were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	refranchised
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	during the fiscal year, partially
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	offset by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$7.3&nbsp;million in same
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	store sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, Company Drive-In sales increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	30.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	7.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, as compared to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This improvement was primarily attributable to an increase of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$27.4&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million in same-store sales and $3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million in incremental sales from new drive-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in openings.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The following table reflects the change in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	franchis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e sales, the number of Franchise Drive-Ins, average unit volumes and franchising
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	revenues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;While we do not record Franchise Drive-In sales as revenues, we believe this information is important in understanding our financial performance since these sales are the basis on which we calculate and record franchise royalties.&nbsp;&nbsp;This information is also indicative of the financial health of our franchisees.
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:01.82%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Drive-ins that are temporarily closed for various reasons (repairs, remodeling, relocations, etc.) are not considered closed unless the Company determines that they are unlikely to reopen within a reasonable time.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(2)&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Represents percentage change for drive-ins open for a minimum of 15 months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(3)&nbsp;&nbsp;Consists of revenues derived from franchising activities, including royalties, franchise fees and lease revenues.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	See
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Revenue Recognition Related to Franchise Fees and Royalties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Critical Accounting Policies and Estimates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	section of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Item 7, &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Management&#x2019;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#x201D; included in this Form 10-K
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(4)&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Represents franchise royalties as a percentage of Franchise Drive-In sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Same-store sales for Franchise Drive-Ins increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, showing continued momentum from the initiatives we have implemented to improve product quality, service and value
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	perception
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;During the fiscal fourth quarter, we experienced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	lower-than-expected traffic, reflecting lower consumer spending in the restaurant industry and aggressive competitive activity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Franchising revenues increased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	%, for fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compared to fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, reflecting an increase in royalties related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	positive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	same-store sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	at Franchise Drive-Ins as well as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	new unit growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	franchisee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	acquisition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Drive-Ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	These factors also impacted the increase in the effective royalty rat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	e compared to fiscal year 2015.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Lease revenues increased compared to the prior year due to an increase in same-store sales and the addition of new lease
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Franchising revenues increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$24.2&nbsp;million, or 17.0%, for fiscal year 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compared to fiscal year 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in franchising revenues was driven by a license conversion increasing royalty rates for approximately 900 Franchise Drive-Ins, as well as a 7.3% increase in same-store sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;Lease revenues increased compared to the prior year due to an increase in same-store sales and the addition of 14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	new leases.&nbsp;&nbsp;The effective royalty rate increased compared to fiscal year 2014 as a result of the license conversion discussed above, as well as improved same-store sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Other revenues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	decreased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and decreased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.2&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million in fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as compared to the prior year.&nbsp;&nbsp;The decrease in fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and

	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	was primarily due to

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in minority
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	income from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	operations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Operating Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;The following table presents the overall costs of drive-in operations as a percentage of Company Drive-In sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;Other operating expenses include direct operating costs such as marketing, telephone and utilities, repair and maintenance, rent, property tax and other controllable expenses.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Drive-in level margins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	were unfavorable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	basis points during fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Food and packaging costs were favorable by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	basis points,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	which reflected
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	favorable commodity costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	offset by the impact of vendor contributions that were previously credited against food and paper costs for Company Drive-Ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	that are now being remitted to the BTF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Payroll and other employee benefits were unfavorable by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	basis points reflecting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	investments in improved employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and benefits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to attract and retain employees at the drive-in level
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;O
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ther operating expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	were flat

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as a result of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	leverag

	e

	growt

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Drive-in level margins improved by 90 basis points during fiscal year 2015 reflecting leverage from improved same-store sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;Food and packaging costs were favorable by 80 basis points,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	which reflected lower commodity costs primarily related to dairy, as well as implementation of an inventory management tool
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Payroll and other employee benefits were unfavorable by 30 basis points reflecting increased health care expenses and increased incentive compensation related to growth in same-store sales.&nbsp;&nbsp;O
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ther operating expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	improved 40 basis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	points
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as a result of leverag
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	growth.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increase during fiscal year 2015 was primarily attributable to our increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	investment in technology initiatives at Company Drive-Ins.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&#xFEFF;

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	de

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	creased $1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million to $

	0

	.

	&nbsp;million in fiscal year

	2016

	compared to $

	1.4

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

	2015 was the result of
</FONT>

	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$1.3&nbsp;million impairment charge in fiscal year 2015 for the write-off of assets associated with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	some lower performing drive-ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Income Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The provision for income taxes reflects an effective tax rate of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	30
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.7% for fiscal year 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	29.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% for fiscal year 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5 &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and 35.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% for fiscal year 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The effective income tax rate for fiscal year 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	impacted by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the recognition of tax benefits related to a change in uncertain tax positions from prior years and legislation that reinstated and extended the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Work Opportunity Tax Credit (&#x201C;WOTC&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The lower effective income tax rate for fiscal year 2015 was primarily attributable to the recognition of prior
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	years&#x2019; federal tax deductions, a decrease in the valuation allowance for the deferred tax asset related to state net operating losses and legislation that reinstated and extended the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	WOTC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Excluding the nonrecurring tax benefits mentioned above, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	effective tax rate would have been 34.7%, 35.1% and 35.0% for fiscal years 2016, 2015 and 2014, respectively.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	O
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ur tax rate may continue to vary significantly from quarter to quarter depending on the timing of stock option exercises and dispositions by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	option holders and as circumstances on other tax matters change.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

	de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	20

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	These purchases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	creased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compared to the same period last year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	due to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	additions to rebuilds, relocations and remodels of existing drive-ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and brand technology investments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, offset by a decline in cash used for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	acquisition of underlying real estate for drive-ins
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Additionally, other cash flows used for investing increased as a result of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	notes receivable, discussed above in &#x201C;Financial Position
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x201D; &nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Financing Cash Flows.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Net cash used in financing activities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	creased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	82
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.3&nbsp;million to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	37.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	119.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million in fiscal year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	de
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	crease primarily relates to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$140.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	net
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	borrowings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	from the debt financing transaction and scheduled principal payments, offset by $18.4&nbsp;million in debt issuance and extinguishment costs, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million increase in purchases of treasury stock and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.9&nbsp;million decrease in proceeds from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	exercise of stock options.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR:YELLOW;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During fiscal year 2013, in a private transaction, various subsidiaries of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ours
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(the &#x201C;Co-Issuers&#x201D;) refinanced and paid $155
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million of the Series 2011 Senior Secured Fixed Rate Notes, Class A-2 (the &#x201C;2011 Fixed Rate Notes&#x201D;) with the issuance of $155
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million of Series 2013-1 Senior Secured Fixed Rate Notes, Class A-2 (the &#x201C;2013 Fixed Rate Notes&#x201D;), which bear interest at 3.75% per annum.&nbsp;&nbsp;The 2013 Fixed Rate Notes have an expected life of seven years, interest payable monthly, no scheduled principal amortization and an anticipated repayment date in July 2020.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On May 17, 2016,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in a private transaction,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the Co-Issuers issued $425.0 million of Series 2016-1 Senior Secured Fixed Rate Notes, Class A-2 (the &#x201C;2016 Fixed Rate Notes&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	which bears interest at 4.47% per annum.&nbsp;&nbsp;The 2016 Fixed Rate Notes have an expected life of seven years with an anticipated repayment date in May 2023.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Co-Issuers also entered into a securitized financing facility of Series 2016-1 Senior Secured Variable Funding Notes, Class A-1 (the &#x201C;2016 Variable Funding Notes&#x201D; and, together with the 2016 Fixed Rate Notes, the &#x201C;2016 Notes&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to replace the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Series 2011-1 Senior Secured Variable Funding Notes, Class A-1 (the &#x201C;2011 Variable Funding Notes&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	revolving credit facility
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	provides
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	access
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a maximum of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$150.0&nbsp;million of 2016 Variable Funding Notes and certain other credit instruments, including letters of credit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Interest on the 2016 Variable Funding Notes is based on the one-month London Interbank Offered Rate or Commercial Paper, depending on the funding source, plus 2.0%, per annum.&nbsp;&nbsp;An annual commitment fee of 0.5% is payable monthly on the unused portion of the 2016 Variable Funding Notes facility.&nbsp;&nbsp;The 2016 Variable Funding Notes have an expected life of five years with an anticipated repayment date in May 2021 with two one-year extension options available upon certain conditions including meeting a minimum debt service coverage ratio threshold.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	used a portion of the net proceeds from the issuance of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016 Fixed Rate Notes to repay our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	existing 2011 Fixed Rate Notes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2011 Variable Funding Notes in full and to pay the costs associated with the securitized financing transaction, including prepayment premiums.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Fixed Rate Notes was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	%, respectively.&nbsp;&nbsp;The weighted-average interest cost includes the effect of the loan origination costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In connection with the 2016 transaction described above,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	recognized an $8.8&nbsp;million loss from the early extinguishment of debt during the third quarter of fiscal year 2016, which primarily consisted of a $5.9&nbsp;million prepayment premium and the $2.9&nbsp;million write-off of unamortized deferred loan fees remaining from the refinanced debt.&nbsp;&nbsp;This is reflected in &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	loss from early
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	extinguishment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of debt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x201D; on the Consolidated Statements of Income.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Loan origination costs associated with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016 transaction totaled $12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million and were allocated among the 2016 Notes.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Loan costs are being amortized over each note&#x2019;s expected life, and the unamortized balance is categorized as &#x201C;debt origination costs, net&#x201D; on the Consolidated Balance Sheets.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For additional information on our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2013 Fixed Rate Notes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>

	Notes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, see note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x2013; Debt, included in Part&nbsp;II, Item 8, &#x201C;Financial Statements and Supplementary Data&#x201D; in this Annual Report on Form 10-K.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;COLOR:#000000;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In August 2014, our Board of Directors extended our share repurchase program, authorizing us to purchase up to $105
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million of our outstanding shares of common stock during fiscal year&nbsp;2015.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	October&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2014, the Company entered into an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	accelerated share repurchase (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ASR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	agreement with a financial institution to purchase $15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.0&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million of the Company&#x2019;s common stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;In exchange for a $15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

	million up-front payment, the financial institution delivered approximately 0.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million shares.&nbsp;&nbsp;During January
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015, the ASR purchase period concluded.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company paid an additional $0.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million with no additional shares delivered, resulting in an average price per share of $26.32.&nbsp;&nbsp;In February

	&nbsp;

	2015, the Company entered into additional ASR agreements with a financial institution to purchase $75

	.0

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	million of the Company&#x2019;s common stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;In exchange for a $75

	.0

	million up-front payment, the financial institution delivered approximately 2.1

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million shares.&nbsp;&nbsp;The ASR transactions completed in July

	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015 with 0.3

	&nbsp;

	million additional shares delivered, resulting in an average price per share of $31.38.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company reflected the ASR transaction
</FONT>

	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as a repurchase of common stock for purposes of calculating earnings per share and as a forward contract indexed to its own common stock.&nbsp;&nbsp;The forward contract met all of the applicable criteria for equity classification.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In August 2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

	us

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to purchase up to $145
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.0

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Board of Directors further extended the share repurchase program effective May 2016, authorizing the purchase of up to an additional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	155.0&nbsp;million of our outstanding shares of common stock through August 31, 2017. During fiscal year 2016, approximately 5.2&nbsp;million shares were repurchased for a total cost of $148.3&nbsp;million, resulting in an average price per share of $28.48.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Share repurchases will be made from time to time in the open market or otherwise, including through an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ASR
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	program, under the terms of a Rule 10b5-1 plan, in privately negotiated transactions or in round lot or block transactions. T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	he share repurchase program may be extended, modified, suspended or discontinued at any time.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	As of
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	88

	.

</FONT>

	million ($

	72.1
</FONT>

	16.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million of restricted cash balances) reflected the impact of the cash generated from operating activities,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	stock option exercise proceeds,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016 debt transaction proceeds and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

</FONT>

	amount

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(1)&nbsp;&nbsp;Includes scheduled principal and interest payments on our 201

	6

	Notes and 2013 Fixed Rate Notes and ass

	umes these notes will be outstanding for the expected seven-year life with anticipated repayment date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	in July 2020
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	and May&nbsp;2023
</FONT>

	, respectively.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

	(2)&nbsp;&nbsp;Purchase obligations primarily relate to the Company&#x2019;s estimated share of system-wide commitments to purchase food products.&nbsp;&nbsp;We have excluded agreements that are cancelable without penalty. These amounts require estimates and could vary due to the timing of volumes and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	changes in market pricing.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;TEXT-INDENT: -13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	(3)&nbsp;&nbsp;Include
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	s $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	0
</FONT>

	.6
</FONT>

	positions and $

	&nbsp;million
</FONT>

	related to guarantees of franchisee leases and loan agreements.&nbsp;&nbsp;As we are not able to reasonably estimate the timing or amount of these payments, if any, the related balances have not been reflected in the &#x201C;Payments Due by Fiscal Year&#x201D; section of the table.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Impact of Inflation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	We are impacted by inflation which has caused increases in our food, labor and benefits costs and has increased our operating expenses.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	To the extent permitted by competition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	and the consumer environment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	, increased costs are recovered through a combination of menu price increases and alternative products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	, efficiencies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	or processes, or by implementing other cost reduction procedures.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Critical Accounting Policies and Estimates
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Consolidated Financial Statements and Notes to Consolidated Financial Statements included in this document contain information that is pertinent to management's discussion and analysis.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The preparation of financial statements in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles requires management to use its judgment to make estimates and assumptions that affect the reported amounts of assets and liabilities and disclosure of contingent assets and liabilities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	These assumptions and estimates could have a material effect on our financial statements.&nbsp;&nbsp;We evaluate our assumptions and estimates on an ongoing basis using historical experience and various other factors that are believed to be relevant under the circumstances.&nbsp;&nbsp;Actual results may differ from these estimates under different assumptions or conditions.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We perform a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	periodic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	review of our financial reporting and disclosure practices and accounting policies to ensure that our financial reporting and disclosures provide accurate and transparent information relative to the current economic and business environment.&nbsp;&nbsp;We believe the following significant accounting policies and estimates involve a
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	27
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
