<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SONIC CORP.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	August 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(In thousands, except per share data)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	plan to fund the share repurchase program from existing cash on hand at August&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2016, cash flows from operations and borrowings under our 2016 Variable Funding Notes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Dividends
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In August 2014, the Company initiated a quarterly cash dividend program and paid a quarterly dividend of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.09
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share of common stock, totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$18.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million for fiscal year 2015, and paid a quarterly dividend of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share of common stock, totaling $21.3&nbsp;million for fiscal year 2016.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subsequent to the end of fiscal year 2016, the Company declared a quarterly dividend of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$0.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	per share of common stock to be paid to stockholders of record as of the close of business on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	November&nbsp;9,&nbsp;2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, with a payment date of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	November&nbsp;18,&nbsp;2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The future declaration of quarterly dividends and the establishment of future record and payment dates are subject to the final determination of the Company&#x2019;s Board of Directors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:1PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Employee Benefit and Cash Incentive Plans
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company sponsors a qualified defined contribution 401(k) plan for employees meeting certain eligibility requirements.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under the plan, employees are entitled to make pre-tax contributions.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company matches an amount equal to the employee&#x2019;s contributions up to a maximum of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the employee&#x2019;s salaries depending on years of service.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s contributions during fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	were $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	$1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million, respectively.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	short-term and long-term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	cash incentive plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(the &#x201C;Incentive Plans&#x201D;) that apply to certain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	employees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and grants of awards under the Incentive Plans are at all times subject to the approval of the Company&#x2019;s Board of Directors.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under certain awards pursuant to the Incentive Plans, if predetermined earnings goals are met, a predetermined percentage of the employee&#x2019;s salary may be paid in the form of a bonus.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company recognized as expense incentive bonuses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million during fiscal years
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SONIC CORP.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	NOTES TO CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:150%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	August 31, 2016, 2015 and 2014
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(In thousands, except per share data)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Commitments and Contingencies
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Litigation
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company is involved in various legal proceedings and has certain unresolved claims pending.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on the information currently available, management believes that all claims currently pending are either covered by insurance or would not have a material adverse effect on the Company&#x2019;s business, operating results or financial condition.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Note Repurchase Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On December 20, 2013, the Company extended a note purchase agreement to a bank that serves to guarantee the repayment of a franchisee loan, with a term through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2018
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and also benefits the franchisee with a lower financing rate.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of default by the franchisee, the Company would purchase the franchisee loan from the bank, thereby becoming the note holder and providing an avenue of recourse with the franchisee.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company recorded a liability for this guarantee which was based on the Company&#x2019;s estimate of fair value.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of August 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, the balance of the franchisee&#x2019;s loan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	was $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Lease Commitments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	The Company has obligations under various operating lease agreements with third-party lessors related to the real estate for certain Company Drive-In operations that were sold to franchisees.&nbsp;&nbsp;Under these agreements, which expire through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	29
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	, the Company remains secondarily liable for the lease payments for which it was responsible as the original lessee.&nbsp;&nbsp;As of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	August 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	, the amount remaining under these guaranteed lease obligations totaled
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	&nbsp;million.&nbsp;&nbsp;At this time, the Company does not anticipate any material defaults under the foregoing leases; therefore,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	no
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES;">
	liability has been provided.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Purchase Obligations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	At
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	August 31, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the Company had purchase obligations of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	23
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;million which primarily related to its estimated share of system-wide commitments for food products.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has excluded agreements that are cancelable without penalty.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	RECITALS

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic is the developer and owner of the right to license the distinctive and proprietary drive in, food service system under which food and beverages are sold to the public from drive in restaurants and Non-traditional Locations (as defined in Section 1.07) operated under the trade name and federally registered trademark and service mark &#x201C;Sonic&#x201D;.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Sonic System so developed now includes, among other things, the following elements, all or some of which may be deleted, changed, improved, or further develope
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d by Sonic from time to time:&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Methods and procedures for the preparation and serving o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	f food and beverage products.&nbsp;
</FONT>

	al paper or plastic items).&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee wishes to obtain a license from Sonic to operate a Sonic drive in restaurant pursuant to the Sonic System and to be afforded the assistance provided by Sonic in connection therewith, and understands and accepts the terms, conditions, and covenants set forth herein as those which are reasonably necessary to maintain Sonic&#x2019;s high and uniform standards of quality and service designed to protect the goodwill and enhance the public image of the Proprietary Marks and the Sonic System, and recognizes the necessity of operating the licensed Sonic drive in restaurant in faithful compliance therewith, and with Sonic&#x2019;s standards and specifications.&nbsp;
</FONT>

	1.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

	lized form in this Agreement.

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Affiliate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The word &#x201C;Affiliate&#x201D; shall mean (a) any stockholder, director, or officer of a specified Person (if the specified Person is a corporation), (b) any partner of a specified Person (if the specified Person is a partnership), (c) any member of a specified Person (if the specified Person is a limited liability company), (d) any employee of a specified Person, and (e) any Person which directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries Controls the specified Person, the specified Person Controls, or shares a common Cont
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rol with the specified Person.
</FONT>
</FONT>

	1.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The word &#x201C;Control&#x201D; means the possession, direct or indirect, of the power to direct or cause the direction of the management and policies of a Person or entity, whether through the ownership of voting securiti
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	es, by contract, or otherwise.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	DMA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The term &#x201C;DMA&#x201D; shall mean a Designated Market Area as defined by A.C. Nielsen C
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ompany from time to time.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Gross Sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Gross Sales&#x201D; shall mean all revenues from all business conducted upon or from the Sonic Restaurant, whether evidenced by check, cash, credit, charge account, debit card, stored-value card, exchange, or otherwise, and shall include (without limitation) the amounts received from the sale of goods, wares, and merchandise, including sales of food, beverages, and tangible property of every kind and nature, promotional or otherwise (excluding restaurant equipment), and for services performed from or at the Sonic Restaurant, whether the Licensee fills the orders from the Sonic Restaurant or elsewhere.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each charge or sale via credit, debit card, stored-value card, or other payment means shall constitute a sale for the full price in the month during which the charge or sale occurs, regardless of the time when the Licensee receives payment (in whole or in part) for the charge or sale.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Gross Sales&#x201D; shall not include (a) sales of merchandise for which the Licensee makes a cash refund, if previously included in Gross Sales; (b) the price of merchandise returned by customers for exchange, if the Licensee previously included the sales price of the merchandise returned by the customer in Gross Sales and includes the sales price of merchandise delivered to the customer in exchange in Gross Sales; (c) the amount of any sales tax imposed by any governmental authority directly on sales and collected from customers, if the Licensee adds the amount of the tax to the sales price or absorbs the amount of the sales tax in the sales price and the Licensee actually pays the tax to the governmental authority; (d) amounts not received for menu items because of discounts or coupons, if properly documented; and (e) amounts received from the sale of Sonic-approved stored-value cards.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Gross Sales&#x201D; also shall not include any proceeds received by the Licensee pursuant to an assignment made in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the provisions of Section 13.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	License
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The word &#x201C;License&#x201D; shall mean the rights granted the Licensee pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Section 2 of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	MSA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The term &#x201C;MSA&#x201D; shall mean a Metropolitan Statistical Area or a Micropolitan Statistical Area, as applicable, as defined by the United States Census Bureau from time to time.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.07.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Non-traditional Locations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Non-traditional Locations&#x201D; shall mean permanent or temporary food service facilities operating under one or more of the Proprietary Marks at locations featuring facilities other than free-standing buildings with canopies devoted solely to the operation of a Sonic drive-in restaurant and accessible to the general public by automobile from public thoroughfares.&nbsp;&nbsp;Non-traditional Locations shall include (without limitation) (a) military bases and other governmental facilities; (b) universities and schools; (c) airports and other transportation facilities; (d) stadiums, arenas, and other sports and entertainment venues; (e) amusement and theme parks; (f) cafeterias and food courts in shopping centers, shopping malls, office buildings, and industrial buildings; (g) hotels and convention centers; (h) hospitals and nursing facilities; (i) museums, zoos, and other public facilities; and (j) highway travel plazas, convenience stores, and gasoline filling stations.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.08.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Person
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The word &#x201C;Person&#x201D; shall mean any individual or business entity, including (without limitation) a corporation, joint venture, general partnership, limited partnership, limited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	liability company, or trust.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.09.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Proprietary Marks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Proprietary Marks&#x201D; shall mean the distinctive and characteristic trade names, trademarks, service marks, and trade dress which Sonic designates in the Sonic Operations Manual or otherwise in writing or through usage from time to time as prescribed for use with the Sonic System and as may from time to time be developed, including (without limitation) the terms &#x201C;Sonic,&#x201D; &#x201C;America&#x2019;s Drive-In,&#x201D; &#x201C;Route 44,&#x201D; &#x201C;Wacky Pack,&#x201D; &#x201C;Fountain Favorites,&#x201D; &#x201C;Frozen Favorites,&#x201D; &#x201C;It&#x2019;s Sonic Good,&#x201D; &#x201C;SuperSonic,&#x201D; &#x201C;Your Morning Drink Stop!,&#x201D; &#x201C;Ultimate Drink Stop,&#x201D; and &#x201C;My Sonic;&#x201D; signs; emblems; menu housings; designs; color schemes; standardized premises featuring characteristic exterior style, canopies, colors, and design (including angled parking stalls equipped with menu housings, speakers, and tray supports); interior furnis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	hings; and equipment layout.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.10.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Protected Area
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Protected Area&#x201D; shall mean the area defined by Se
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ction 2.02 of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage78"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.11.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic Restaurant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Sonic Restaurant&#x201D; shall mean the Sonic drive-in restaurant licensed by this Agreement and may alternatively be referred t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	o herein as the &#x201C;Restaurant.&#x201D;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.12.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic System
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The phrase &#x201C;Sonic System&#x201D; shall mean the Proprietary Marks, proprietary and confidential information, methods, specifications, and trade secrets of Sonic, including (without limitation) the Sonic Operations Manual and consisting of (a) methods and procedures for the preparation of food and beverage products; (b) confidential recipes for food products; (c) distinctive service and accessories; (d) plans and specifications for interior and exterior signs, designs, layouts, and color schemes (whether copyrighted or not); (e) methods, techniques, formats, systems, specifications, procedures, information, trade secrets, and sales and marketing programs; (f) methods of business operations and management; (g) knowledge and experience regarding the operation and franchising of Sonic drive-in restaurants; (h) payment methods, including (without limitation) PAYS; and (i) such further elements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as set forth in the Recitals.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:28PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	LICENSE GRANT
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic grants to Licensee for the following stated term the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	right, license, and privilege:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Location
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;To adopt and use the Sonic System at the Sonic Restaurant located
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	at&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	To have the exclusive rights to adopt and use the Sonic System for a Sonic drive-in restaurant to be constructed within the current boundaries of the town or city&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, for a period of six months from the date hereof, with the obligation of selecting and having such site approved within such six-month period and completing Section 2.01(a), above,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	within such six-month period.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Trade Radius
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Subject to the provisions of Sections 2.02(c) and 2.02(d), below, Sonic shall not own or operate a Sonic drive-in restaurant and shall not license any other Person to own or operate a Sonic drive-in restaurant (other than a Sonic drive-in restaurant licensed prior to the date of this Agreement) within the Protected Area, which is the area determined as of the date of this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	by the following provisions:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	An area defined by a radius extending one and one-half miles from the front door of the Sonic Restaurant if located within a city, town, or MSA having a p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	opulation of 75,000 or more.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	An area defined by a radius extending two miles from the front door of the Sonic Restaurant if located within a city, town, or MSA having a population of less than 75,000 but mo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	re than 25,000.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 63PT;TEXT-INDENT: -27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	An area defined by a radius extending three miles from the front door of the Sonic Restaurant if located within a city, town, or MSA having a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	population of 25,000 or less.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	An area defined by a radius extending three miles from the front door of the Sonic Restaurant if locate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d outside a city, town, or MSA.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Protected Area shall not extend into: (i) the contractually-granted protected radius of any Sonic drive-in restaurant in existence as of the date of this Agreement (&#x201C;Previously Protected Radius&#x201D;) and (ii) the protected area of any developer under an area development agreement with Sonic in existence as of the date of this Agreement (&#x201C;Previously Protected Development Area&#x201D;).&nbsp;&nbsp;Consequently, any Previously Protected Radius and any Previously Protected Development Area shall be excepted from the Protected Area.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall determine the population of an MSA&nbsp;&nbsp;from time to time after the date of this Agreement according to the latest published federal census (or other data selected by Sonic) and may reduce the Protected Area accordingly upon notice to the Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;If more than one subpart of Section 2.02(a) applies, then only the subpart with the smallest area shall apply.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic shall not own, operate, or license any other Person to own or operate a Non-traditional Location (other than a Non-traditional Location owned, operated, or licensed prior to the date of this Agreement) within the Protected Area without the Licensee&#x2019;s prior written consent.&nbsp;&nbsp;Simultaneously with the request for that written consent, Sonic shall offer the Licensee a right of first refusal to develop the Non-traditional Location.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee must notify Sonic in writing of its decision regarding the right of first refusal to license and operate the Non-traditional Location within 30 days after Sonic notifies the Licensee of Sonic&#x2019;s request for the Licensee&#x2019;s written consent to own, operate, and/or license the Non-traditional Location.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee chooses to exercise its right of first refusal, the Licensee must sign Sonic&#x2019;s then-current form of license agreement for a Non-traditional Location for the applicable jurisdiction within 30 days after the Licensee notifies Sonic of its decision.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage79"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee then must open the Non-traditional Location within the time period specified in the license agreement (if specified) or within 12 months after the date of the license agreement (if not specified).&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee does not execute that agreement within the foregoing 30-day period or does not exercise its right of first refusal within the foregoing 30-day period, Sonic shall have the right to proceed with the ownership, operation, and/or licensing of the Non-traditional Location as disclosed to the Licensee only if the Licensee has given its written consent to Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee elects, in its sole and absolute discretion, not to give its written consent, Sonic shall not own, operate, or license any other Person to own or operate the Non-traditional Location, except that Sonic may own, operate, or license any other Person to own or operate the Non-traditional Location without Licensee&#x2019;s consent, subject to Licensee&#x2019;s right of first refusal described herein, if the Non-Traditional Location is in (i) an airport or other transportation facility; (ii) a stadium, arena, or other sports and entertainment venue; or (iii) a military base or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	other governmental facility.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic has and hereby further reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to acquire the assets or controlling ownership of an existing restaurant within the Protected Area. However, prior to converting an acquired restaurant to a Sonic drive-in restaurant or a Non-traditional Location within the Protected Area, Sonic shall offer the Licensee a right of first refusal to acquire the restaurant at a price equal to Sonic&#x2019;s cost of acquiring the restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the restaurant represents a part of an acquisition of multiple restaurants, Sonic shall make a reasonable allocation of its cost to acquire the restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee must notify Sonic of its decision regarding the right of first refusal within 30 days after Sonic gives the Licensee written notice of its intention to convert the restaurant to a Sonic drive-in restaurant or Non-traditional Location.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee chooses to exercise its right of first refusal, the Licensee must sign Sonic&#x2019;s then-current form of license agreement for a Sonic drive-in restaurant or Non-traditional Location, and pay the required license fee, as applicable, within 20 days after the Licensee notifies Sonic of its decision.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the Licensee fails to convert the restaurant to a Sonic drive-in restaurant or Non-traditional Location pursuant to the terms of the applicable license agreement, Sonic shall have the right to repurchase the restaurant from the Licensee at the same purchase price.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee does not exercise its right of first refusal, Sonic shall have the right to own, operate, and/or license other Persons to own or operate the restaurant or Sonic may sell or otherwise dispose of the restaurant to any person or entity under any terms or conditions Sonic deems appropriate, provided in no case will the restaurant be operated as a Sonic drive-in restaurant or a Non-traditional Location without the consent of Licensee, except as may be allowed pursuant to Section 2.02(c).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Licensee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall advertise to the p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ublic as a licensee of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Use of Sonic&#x2019;s Marks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall adopt and use the Proprietary Marks, but only in connection with the sale from the Sonic Restaurant of those food and beverage products which have been designated in the Sonic menu as specified in the Sonic Operations Manual.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Site Selection
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the Licensee receives this License pursuant to Section 2.01(b), above, the selection of a site by Licensee shall be subject to the approval of Sonic in accordance with the standard site approval procedures required by this Agreement and the standard practices of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event a site for the Sonic Restaurant has not been approved by Sonic before the expiration of the six-month period provided for by Section 2.01(b), above, then this Agreement shall expire and be of no further force or effect.&nbsp;&nbsp;In such case, Sonic will immediately refund to Licensee the license fee less the sum of $15,000, which shall be fully earned by Sonic upon execution and delivery of this Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Relocation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee relocates the Sonic Restaurant during the term of this Agreement (which relocation must be within the Protected Area) with the written consent of Sonic (which consent Sonic shall not withhold unreasonably), this Agreement shall continue to apply to the Sonic Restaurant in accordance with the terms contained in this Agreement, except that Sonic and the Licensee shall enter into an amendment to this Agreement to change the address of the Sonic Restaurant accordingly.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon such relocation, the Protected Area shall be shifted based on the new location according to Section 2.02 and less and except (i) the contractually-granted protected radius of any Sonic drive-in restaurant in existence prior to the relocation and (ii) the protected area of any developer under an area development agreement with Sonic in existence prior to the relocation.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.07.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rights Reserved to Sonic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as expressly limited by this Agreement, Sonic retains all rights with respect to the Sonic System, the Proprietary Marks, the sale of similar or dissimilar products and services, and any other activities Sonic deems appropriate whenever and wherever it desires.&nbsp;&nbsp;Specifically, but without limitation, Sonic reserves the following rights:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The right to establish and operate, and to grant to others the right to establish and operate, similar businesses or any other businesses offering similar or dissimilar products and services through similar or dissimilar channels of distribution, at any locations inside or outside the Protected Area under trademarks or service marks other than the Proprietary Marks and on any terms and conditions Sonic deems appropriate;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The right to provide, offer, and sell, and to grant others the right to provide, offer, and sell, goods and services that are identical or similar to and/or competitive with those provided at the Sonic Restaurant, whether identified by the Proprietary Marks or other trademarks or service marks, through dissimilar distribution channels (including, without limitation, the Internet or similar electronic media) both inside and outside the Protected Area and on any terms and conditions Sonic deems appropriate;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The right to establish and operate, and to grant to others the right to establish and operate, businesses offering dissimilar products and services, both inside and outside the Protected Area, under the Proprietary Marks and on any terms and conditions Sonic deems appropriate;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The right to operate, and to grant others the right to operate, Sonic drive-in restaurants or Non-traditional Locations anywhere outside the Protected Area under any terms and conditions Sonic deems appropriate regardless of the proximity to the Sonic Restaurant;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The right to be acquired (whether through acquisition of assets, ownership interests, or otherwise, regardless of the form of transaction) by a business providing products and services similar to those provided at the Sonic Restaurant, or by another business, even if such business operates, franchises, and/or licenses competitive businesses in the Protected Area.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:28PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	TERM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Initial Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless sooner terminated as hereafter provided, the term of this Agreement, including the License, shall end 20 years from the effective date of this Agreement as set forth on the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	cover page to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Opening of Restaurant
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee expressly acknowledges and agrees that a pre-condition to opening the Sonic Restaurant shall be Sonic&#x2019;s written authorization to open, which authorization shall be given only upon Licensee&#x2019;s completing, to Sonic&#x2019;s satisfaction, (i) construction of the Sonic Restaurant, (ii) preparation of the Sonic Restaurant for commencement of operations, and (iii) training as required by Se
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ction 6.04 of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;At the end of the initial term, if Licensee desires, Licensee may renew the rights granted under this Agreement, including the License to adopt and use the Sonic System at the Sonic Restaurant, for an additional 10-year term, provided that prior to the ex
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	piration of the initial term:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee gives Sonic written notice of Licensee&#x2019;s election to renew not less than six months nor more than 12 months prior to the end of the initial term.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee is not, when notice is given, in material default of any provision of this Agreement or any amendment hereof or successor agreement hereto or in material default of any other agreement between Licensee and Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates involving any other license agreement and has substantially complied with the terms and conditions of this Agreement and all other such agreeme
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nts, during the term thereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All monetary obligations owed by Licensee to Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates from any source whatsoever (whether under this Agreement or otherwise) have bee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	n satisfied prior to renewal.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee executes a license agreement containing the same terms and conditions as this Agreement, except that the license agreement shall provide for a term of 10 years and shall contain the then-current royalty rate and the then-current advertising and brand expenditure requirements; provided, however, that in lieu of an initial license fee, a renewal fee shall be paid to Sonic in the amount of:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) $4,500, or (ii) 20% of the then-current initial license fee, whichever is greater.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, the renewal fee shall not exceed $9,000 as adjusted for
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage81"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	inflation on January 1 of each year in accordance with the consumer price index and using December
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of 2006 as the base amount.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee performs such remodeling, repairs, replacements, and redecorations as Sonic may reasonably require to cause the restaurant equipment and fixtures to conform to the plans and specifications being used for new or remodeled Sonic drive-in res
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	taurants on the renewal date.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee executes a general release, in a form satisfactory to Sonic, of any and all claims the Licensee may have against Sonic and its Affiliates, including (without limitation) all claims arising under any federal, state, or local law, rule, or ordinance.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee principal and/or manager at their expense attend and satisfactorily complete such retraining program as Sonic may require at its sole discret
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ion.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee meets the remodeling requirements set fo
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rth in Section 6.02(d) herein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:28PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	DUTIES OF SONIC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic agrees to regularly advise and consult with Licensee in connection with the operation of the Sonic Restaurant and to provide the follow
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ing to Licensee:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Standard Sonic Plans and Specifications for a free standing building, equipment layout, and signs (see Section 6.03), together with advice and consultation.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any modifications for nonstandard buildings, whether required by local zoning or building laws or otherwise, must be approved in writing by Sonic and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	are to be paid by Licensee.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Operations Manual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Sonic Operations Manual containing the standards, specifications, procedures, and methods for operating a Sonic drive-in restaurant, one copy to which Licensee will be given access for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the term of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Marketing Assistance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain marketing materials and such merchandising, marketing, and advertising research data and advice as may be developed from time to time by Sonic and deemed to be helpful in the operation of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a Sonic drive-in restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Communication
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain management development and motivational seminars and periodic newsletters which communicate to Licensee available advertising materials and new developments, techniques, and improvements in areas of restaurant equipment, management, food preparation, and service which are pertinent to the operation of a restau
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rant using the Sonic System.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Evaluation Program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;A field evaluation of the Restaurant will be conducted for the mutual benefit of both Sonic and Licensee to promote uniform standards of operation and quality control.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
