<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	License Fee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee acknowledges that:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) the initial grant of the License constitutes the sole consideration for the payment of a license fee of $45,000 paid by Licensee to Sonic concurrently with the execution hereof; and (b) the fee has been earned by Sonic (except where the construction of the Restaurant has not been completed within one year from the date of this Agreement as discussed in Section 6.02(a) and except as provided hereafter in this Section 5.01).&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic reserves the right, in case construction of the Restaurant should be abandoned, the lease assigned for a purpose other than the operation of the Sonic Restaurant, or other interest in the premises be relinquished for a purpose other than the operation of the Sonic Restaurant, to terminate this Agreement, including the License, upon written notice, after which Sonic will immediately refund to Licensee the license fee less the sum of $15,000, which shall be fully earned by Sonic upon execution and delivery of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall have the right, if Licensee does not consummate a lease or purchase a site for the Restaurant within one year from the date of this Agreement, to terminate this Agreement, including the License, upon written notice, after which Sonic will immediately refund to Licensee the license fee less the sum of $15,000, which shall be fully earned by Sonic upon execution and delivery of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The calculation of Gross Sales and the corresponding royalty fees shall take place on a cumulative basis.&nbsp;&nbsp;For example, the following formula results in the calculation of the royalty fee on $50,000 of Gross Sales:&nbsp;&nbsp;Royalty Fee = ($5,000 x .02) + ($5,000 x .03) + ($5,000 x .035) + ($5,000 x .04) + ($5,000 x .045) + ($25,000 x .05).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The payment of royalty fees, as well as the payment of any other obligations incurred under the terms of this Agreement, shall be made via automated clearing house (ACH) or other electron
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ic means approved by Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Brand Fee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On or before the 10th day of each calendar month throughout the term of this Agreement, Licensee shall pay to the Sonic Brand Fund, which is administered by Sonic, a brand&nbsp;&nbsp;contribution fee in an amount equal to .90% of the Gross Sales of the Sonic Restaurant during the calendar month next precedin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	g the date of such payment.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The amount due to Sonic by Licensee pursuant to Section 5.03(a), above, shall be in addition to and separate from that which Licensee is obligated to contribute pursuant to Sections 11.01(a) an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d 11.01(c) of this Agreement.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transfer Fee

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;A transfer fee in the amount of $1,000 shall be paid by Licensee in the event of a transfer or assignment of this Agreement (resulting in a change in Control of the Agreement) to a licensee then-currently qualified as a licensee, excluding assignments unde
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	r Sections 13.02 and 13.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A transfer fee in the amount of $3,000 shall be paid by Licensee in the event of a transfer or assignment of this Agreement (resulting in a change in Control of this License) to a new licensee not then-currently qualified as a licensee, excluding assignments un
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	der Sections 13.02 and 13.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Late Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event any payments required by Sections 5.02, 5.03, 5.04, or 5.07 are not paid on or before the date on which they are due, a late charge in an amount equal to 1.75% per month shall be levied against such amounts due and shall be owing to Sonic by the Licensee from the date on which such obligations were due until any such obligations are paid in full.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event any payments required by Sections 5.02, 5.03, 5.04, or 5.07 are not paid on or before the date on which they are due three or more times during any 12-month period, in addition to all other rights of Sonic contained in this Agreement or otherwise, (a) Sonic may require the Licensee to submit a statement of Gross Sales in the form prescribed by Sonic and at a frequency prescribed by Sonic, such as weekly; and (b) Sonic may require the Licensee to pay obligations incurred under the terms of this Agreement more frequently than once a month, such as weekly.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the interest rate set out in this Section 5.05 exceeds that amount permitted by Oklahoma law, then the maximum interest rate permitted by Oklahoma law shall be charged.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic&#x2019;s acceptance of any partial or late payment does not affect Sonic&#x2019;s right to terminate this Agreement pursuant to the terms of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, Licensee acknowledges that this Section 5.05 is not an agreement to accept any partial payments or payments after they are due or Sonic&#x2019;s commitment to extend credit to, or otherwise finance the operation of, the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage83"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Taxes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall pay when due all taxes levied or assessed on Licensee and the Sonic Restaurant including, without limitation, unemployment, sales, or gross receipts taxes, and all accounts or other indebtedness of any kind incurred by Licensee in conducting the business of the Sonic Restaurant.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the time and manner prescribed by Sonic, Licensee shall also pay an amount equal to any sales tax or gross receipts tax, but not including any net income tax upon Sonic, imposed on Sonic or its Affiliates with respect to any payments from Licensee to Sonic required under this Agreement, unless the tax is credited against a net income tax otherwise payable by Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the event of a dispute with a taxing authority as to (a) Licensee&#x2019;s liability for taxes or (b) Sonic&#x2019;s or its Affiliate&#x2019;s liability for any taxes upon which Licensee is required under this Section 5.06 to make payment to Sonic, Licensee may contest the validity or the amount of the tax or indebtedness in accordance with the law and regulations of the taxing authority.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall provide Licensee with all information, cooperation, and assistance that Licensee may reasonably request in connection with any dispute as to Licensee&#x2019;s, Sonic&#x2019;s, or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliate&#x2019;s liability for taxes.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall not permit a tax sale, seizure, levy, or similar writ or warrant by a creditor to occur against the Sonic Restaurant or any of its assets.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the event a state taxing authority makes a refund to Sonic or its Affiliate of taxes paid for which Sonic previously received payment from Licensee under this Section 5.06, Sonic shall pay to Licensee the amount of the taxes refunded by the state taxing authority to Sonic or its Affiliate which equals the amount Licensee previously paid to Sonic under this Section 5.06.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All notices received by Licensee from a state taxing authority regarding the alleged, potential, or actual tax liability of Sonic or its Affiliates shall be given to Sonic within 15 calendar days of receipt by Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic and Licensee agree to consult in good faith to determine the nature of any action to be taken in connection with the notice or any demands contained therein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.07
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Technology Fee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For Gross Sales incurred beginning on March 1, 2016, and thereafter during the continuance of this Agreement, but subject to Section 5.07(b) below, Licensee shall pay to the Brand Technology Fund, on or before the 10th day of each calendar month throughout the term of this Agreement, a technology fee in an amount equal to .25% of the Gross Sales during the calendar month next preceding the date of such payment, provided:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If the Sonic Restaurant is in operation for the full calendar year 2015, the monthly technology fee paid through the March 2021 payment shall instead be an amount equal to .25% of the Gross Sales for calendar year 2015 divided by 12.&nbsp;&nbsp;For example, if the Gross Sales for calendar year 2015 were $1,200,000.00, then the monthly technology fee beginning with the April 2016 payment through the March 2021 payment would be $250.00.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	f the Sonic Restaurant is in operation for the full calendar year 2020, the monthly technology fee paid from the April 2021 payment through the March 2026 payment shall instead be an amount equal to .25% of the Gross Sales for calendar year 2020 divided by 12.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The technology fee will continue for Gross Sales incurred on or after March 1, 2026, only upon (i) the approval of a majority of the Franchise Advisory Council (or its successor) and (ii) the approval of 67% of the licensees of the Sonic restaurants in the Sonic System (with one vote per restaurant).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:28PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	DUTIES OF LICENSEE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic Restaurant Site
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The site at which Licensee shall operate the Sonic Restaurant is more fully described in Section 2.01(a).&nbsp;&nbsp;During the term of this Agreement, the site shall be used exclusively for the purpose of operating a license
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d Sonic drive in restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the event the Sonic Restaurant premises suffers some physical casualty, the minimum acceptable quality and appearance for the restored restaurant will be that which existed just prior to the casualty, unless the Sonic Restaurant was below minimum acceptable standards for Sonic at the time of casualty in which event the
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage84"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic Restaurant will be restored to a condition which meets the minimum acceptable standard according to Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, Licensee agrees to make all reasonable effort to have the restored Sonic Restaurant reflect the then-current image, design, and specifications of Sonic drive in restaurants.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Sonic Restaurant is substantially destroyed by fire or other casualty, Licensee may, with the written consent of Sonic, elect to terminate this Agreement in lieu of Licensee reconstructing the restaurant, provided that for a period of 18 months after said election, Licensee shall not enter into, become landlord of, or loan money to any restaurant business within a three-mile radius of the Sonic Restaurant premises which is similar in nature to or competitive with a Sonic drive in restaurant or considered a quick-service restaurant establishment.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Construction and Opening
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee agrees to complete the construction of the Sonic Restaurant and open the Sonic Restaurant to the public within one year from the effective date of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Sonic Restaurant is not constructed and opened to the public before the expiration of the one-year&nbsp;&nbsp;period, then Sonic may terminate this Agreement, making it of no further force or effect. In such case, Sonic will immediately refund to Licensee the license fee less the sum of $15,000, which shall be fully earned by Sonic upon execution and delivery of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless Licensee is remodeling an existing building, Licensee shall construct the Sonic Restaurant in accordance with the site plan approved by Sonic for such site and with Sonic&#x2019;s standard construction plans and specifications (&#x201C;Sonic Plans and Specifications&#x201D;) and layout subject, however, to any alterations thereto that may be required by any applicable law, regulation, or ordinance.&nbsp;&nbsp;If alterations of any kind are required to be made to the site plan, as approved by Sonic, or to the Sonic Plans and Specifications or layouts for any reason, such alterations must be approved by Sonic in writing before any work is begun on the Sonic Restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall submit the final site layout and construction plans for the Sonic Restaurant to Sonic for its written approval.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any costs, including engineering and architectural fees, incurred in obtaining approva
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ls by the appropriate governmen
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	tal authorities of the construction plans, specifications, and layouts shall be paid by Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to opening, Licensee shall submit to Sonic, at no cost to Sonic, a record set of drawings showing all approved changes to the plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and specifications.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee is remodeling the existing Restaurant, Sonic shall have the right to inspect and approve all plans and specifications prior to the commencement of any work.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall submit the final remodeling plans and specifications for the Sonic Restaurant to Sonic for its written approval.&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing in this section shall be construed as an endorsement or guarantee of the conformity of such plans to applicable local, state, or federal building or safety codes, or a guarantee that construction will be done in conformity with such approved plans.&nbsp;&nbsp;In any event, Licensee shall obtain written approval of such plans or written notice of Sonic&#x2019;s waiver of the rights reserved hereunder prior to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	commencement of construction.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall not deviate from the approved plans and specifications in any manner in the construction or remodeling of the restaurant without the prior written approval of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;If at any time Sonic determines (prior to opening date) that Licensee has not constructed or remodeled the Sonic Restaurant in accordance with the plans and specifications approved by Sonic, Sonic shall, in addition to any other remedies, have the right to obtain an injunction from a court of competent authority against the continued construction and opening of the Sonic Restaurant, and Licensee hereby consents to any such injunction.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic may require the Licensee to undertake extensive remodeling and renovation and substantial modifications to existing buildings necessary for the Licensee&#x2019;s restaurant to conform with Sonic&#x2019;s then-existing system image.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic may exercise the foregoing right at any time during the term of this Agreement, but may not require (1) the remodeling of the restaurant more than once every seven years or (2) the remodeling of a restaurant built within the preceding three years, unless the required remodeling will not exceed 15% of the original cost of the building, equipment, and land improvements (as adjusted for increases in the consumer price index after the construction date of the restaurant).&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, Sonic shall have the right to require the Licensee to modify or replace the large Sonic sign for the restaurant at any time during the term of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic exercises its right to require the Licensee to undertake extensive remodeling or renovation or substantial modification within five years of the end of the term of this Agreement, the Licensee may exercise any right to renew the term of this Agreement at that point in time in accordance with the applicable provisions of this Agreement, which renewal then shall take effect as of the expiration of the then-cu
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rrent term of this Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Equipment and Sign
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall install in and about the Sonic Restaurant such equipment, fixtures, furnishings, and other personal property, and shall upgrade or purchase additional equipment, fixtures, furnishings, and other personal property, as are required and which strictly conform to the appearance, uniform
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	standards, and specifications of Sonic existing from time to time, which shall be communicated to Licensee in the Sonic Operations Manual or otherwise in writing.&nbsp;&nbsp;Equipment not required by Sonic shall not be installed without Sonic&#x2019;s prior written consent, except that Licensee may, without Sonic&#x2019;s prior written consent, install security-related equipment that does not interfere with the operation or trade d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ress of the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In order to provide maximum exposure of the Sonic name and marks, Licensee shall prominently display and maintain at Licensee&#x2019;s own expense one Sonic drive in sign (&#x201C;Sign&#x201D;) which complies with the specifications required by Sonic from time to time and in such location as Sonic may approve.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall not display any other sign or advertising at the Sonic Restaurant without Son
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ic&#x2019;s prior written approval.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee may lease the required Sign from any source approved by Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee agrees to require in any lease agreement with suppliers a clause giving Sonic the right to remove the Sign from the Sonic Restaurant upon t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ermination of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee hereby agrees that it shall obtain from the landlord of the property at which the Sonic Restaurant is located a landlord&#x2019;s waiver releasing all claims against any equipment or sign which belongs to Sonic and all claims to fixtures and furnishings that constitute
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Proprietary Marks of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee is or becomes a lessee of the Sonic Restaurant premises, Licensee shall provide Sonic with a true and correct, complete copy of any such lease and obtain Sonic&#x2019;s written approval of the lease terms prior to executing the lease.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall have included in the lease provisions, in form satisfactory to Sonic, expressly permitting both the Licensee and Sonic to take all actions and make all alterations referred to under Section 15.01.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any such lease shall also require the lessor thereunder to give Sonic reasonable notice of any contemplated termination and a reasonable time in which to take and make the above actions and alterations and provide that the Licensee has the unrestricted right t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	o assign such lease to Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Training
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee acknowledges the importance of the quality of business operations among all restaurants in the Sonic System and agrees that it will not allow any of its licensed establishments to be opened or operated without having at least one individual working full time at the Sonic Restaurant who has completed the Stage Career Development Program or other Sonic-designated training program.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the trained individual ceases to work full time at the Sonic Restaurant for whatever reason, the Licensee shall promptly replace the individual with a person who has completed the Stage Career Development Program or other Sonic-designated training program.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee agrees that each individual who participates in the Stage Career Development Program or other Sonic-designated training program for the Sonic Restaurant will, at the request of Sonic, sign a confidentiality agreement in a form prescribed by Sonic agreeing to maintain as confidential certain information learned and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	received during the program.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall pay all traveling expenses, living expenses, and any other personal expenses for themselves and managers while enrolled in the training program.&nbsp;&nbsp;As part of the initial license fee paid pursuant to Section 5.01 herein, Licensee shall have the right to have one principal and one manager of the Sonic Restaurant attend the Stage Career Development Program or other Sonic-designated training program for no cost other than those set out in the preceding sentence.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any additional parties attending the Stage Career Development Program or other Sonic-designated training program shall bear the cost, including any fees and tuition d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ue for such training program.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Upon opening the Sonic Restaurant, all management personnel shall be certified in ServSafe or in another comparable, nationally recognized food safety training and certification program approved by Sonic, the cost of which shall be borne by Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Management personnel subsequently employed by Licensee at the Sonic Restaurant shall have 120 days from the beginning date of such employment to successfully complete such training.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall pay all traveling expenses, living expenses, and any other personal expenses for such persons while participating in the training.&nbsp;&nbsp;Management personnel include any person who has shift responsibility or employee oversight at the Sonic Restaurant and also includes the operating princip
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	al of the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Compliance with Entire System
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee acknowledges that every component of the Sonic System is important to Sonic and to the operation of the Sonic Restaurant as a Sonic drive in restaurant, including a designated menu of food and beverage products; uniformity of food specifications, preparation methods, quality, and appearance; and uniformi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ty of facilities and service.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage86"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic shall have the right to inspect the Sonic Restaurant at all reasonable times to ensure that Licensee&#x2019;s operation thereof is in compliance with the standards and policies of the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;This right to inspect includes the right of Sonic or a third party on behalf of Sonic to conduct food safety audits and operational assessments.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that any inspection, including a food safety audit or an operational assessment, reveals any deficiency or unsatisfactory condition with respect to any aspect of the Sonic Restaurant operation, Licensee shall, within 72 hours of Licensee&#x2019;s receipt of notice of such condition or such other time as Sonic in its sole discretion may provide, correct or repair such deficiency or unsatisfactory condition if it is correctable or repairable within such time period, and, if not, shall within such time commence such correction or repair and thereafter diligently pursue same to completion.&nbsp;&nbsp;The preceding sentence notwithstanding, the Licensee shall take immediate action to correct or repair any deficiency or unsatisfactory condition which poses a risk to public health or safety.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event Licensee fails to comply with the foregoing obligations to correct and repair, Sonic, upon 24 hours&#x2019; notice to Licensee, shall have the right (but no obligation), without being guilty of trespass or tort, to forthwith make or cause to be made such corrections or repairs, and the expense thereof, including board, wages, lodging, and transportation of Sonic personnel, if utilized, shall be paid by Licensee upon billing by Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;The foregoing shall be in addition to any other righ
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	t or remedies Sonic may have.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall comply with the entire Sonic System as described herein and in the Sonic Operations Manual, including but not limited to the following:&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operate the Sonic Restaurant in a clean, wholesome manner in compliance with standards of quality, food safety, service, cleanliness, and appearance as prescribed by governmental authorities and by Sonic; comply with all business policies, practices, and procedures imposed by Sonic; and maintain the building, equipment, and parking area in a good, clean, wholesome condition and repair, well lighted, and in compliance with designated standards as may be prescribed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	from time to time by Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Purchase and install kitchen fixtures, lighting, payment systems, and equipment, and office equipment and signs in accordance with the equipment specifications an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d layout designated by Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Without the prior written consent of Sonic, make no (a) building design conversion or (b) alterations, conversions, or additions to the building or parking area.&nbsp;&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Make repairs or replacements required because of damage, wear, and tear or in order to maintain the Sonic Restaurant building, fixtures, and parking area in good condition and in conformi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ty with blueprints and plans.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Maintain the parking stalls, as required in the standard Sonic Plans and Specifications, for the exclusive use of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic Restaurant customers.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(vi)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Operate the Sonic Restaurant everyday of the year (except Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas), and at least 15 hours per day or such other hours, including specific opening and closing times, as may from time to time be reasonably prescribed by Sonic (except when the Sonic Restaurant is untenantable as a result of fire or other casualty), maintain sufficient supplies of food and paper products, and employ adequate personnel so as to operate the Sonic Restaurant at its maxi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	mum capacity and efficiency.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(vii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Cause all employees of Licensee, while working in the Sonic Restaurant, to:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) wear uniforms of such color, design, and other specifications as Sonic may designate from time to time, (b) present a neat and clean appearance, and (c) render competent and courteous service t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	o Sonic Restaurant customers.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(viii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Serve all menu items which Sonic may deem appropriate and which are included in the menu approved by Sonic at the time to take full advantage of the potential market and achieve standardization in the Sonic System, serve no items which are not set forth in the Sonic Operations Manual and which are not otherwise authorized and approved in writing by Sonic, and display and offer only the menu a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	pproved by Sonic at the time.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ix)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the dispensing and sale of food products: (a) use only containers, cartons, bags, napkins, and other paper goods and packaging bearing the approved trademarks and which meet the Sonic System specifications and quality standards, (b) use only those flavorings, garnishments, and food and beverage ingredients, manufacturers, and brands which meet the Sonic System specifications and quality standards, which Sonic may designate from time to time, and (c) employ only those methods of food handling, preparation, and serving which Sonic may
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	designate from time to time.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(x)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Make prompt payment in accordance with the terms of invoices rendered to Licensee including, but not limited to, invoices for the purchase of fixtures, equipment,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and food and paper supplies.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xi)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At Licensee&#x2019;s expense, comply with all federal, state, and local laws, ordinances, and regulations affecting the operation of the Sonic Restaurant, including all laws, ordinances, or regulations relat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ing to terrorist activities.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Install no electronic games or other games of chance at the Sonic Restaurant without the express pri
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or written consent of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xiii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Furnish Sonic with current home addresses and phone numbers of Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s owners and manager; furnish Sonic with current information regarding the legal and equity ownership and Control of the operation of the Sonic Restaurant; and, upon Sonic&#x2019;s reasonable request, provide updates of financial information, personal financial stateme
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nts, and credit information.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xiv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Notify Sonic&#x2019;s Communications Department or, if not available, the most senior executive officer of Sonic as soon as possible and, in any event, within 12 hours after the occurrence at the Sonic Restaurant of any event which could have an adverse impact on the Sonic Restaurant and/or the Sonic System, including (without limitation) the death or serious bodily injury of any employee or customer for any reason or the risk of infection by a contagious disease.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Only provide a Sonic-approved toy premium that is appropriate for the age of the child; make a Sonic-approved all-age toy premium available upon customer request; and, except in the case of an all-age toy premium provided as appropriate, only offer the Sonic-approved toy premium corresponding to the Sonic-designated promotion.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xvi)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Accept Sonic-designated debit and credit cards, Sonic-approved stored-value cards, and any other Sonic-designated payment means.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xvii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Participate in system-wide initiatives, including technology initiatives such as the PartnerNet technology initiative and other initiatives as may be designated by Sonic from time to time.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:5PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xviii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Deal with Persons supplying goods and services to the Sonic Restaurant in a respectful and responsive manner such that the reputation and goodwill of Sonic, its licensees, and the Sonic System are not tarnished in the business community or with consumers; ensure that all Persons that provide goods or services to the Sonic Restaurant during construction and operation are timely and fully paid for such goods and services, except only to the extent that any of the goods and services are non-conforming, damaged, defective, or missing; and, in the event that a dispute arises as to quality or quantity of goods or services furnished to the Sonic Restaurant, timely communicate with and respond to the supplier in a good faith effort to resolve the dispute.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee cannot avoid the obligations contained in this Section 6.05(c)(xviii) by contracting for or obtaining the goods or services indirectly, such as through an intermediary.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:9PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xix)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Except as to bottled water and paper products and except as allowed by any policy contained in the Sonic Operations Manual, do not sell or serve food and beverage products outside of the Sonic Restaurant premises and do not donate food and beverage products to a third party except upon the prior written consent of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(xx)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Do not sell Sonic coupons, and only sell Sonic-related merchandise on the Internet or by other means upon the prior written consent of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
