<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	No Information to the Public
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee acknowledges that Sonic&#x2019;s parent company, Sonic Corp., is a public company, and that Sonic Corp. makes certain information regarding the performance of the Sonic System available to the public, including investors and financial analysts, in the normal course of business. Licensee further acknowledges that Licensee&#x2019;s own disclosure of certain information to the public could interfere with the business of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee agrees that it will not provide to the public, or to any investor, financial analyst, or person that influences investments, any information that might indicate the performance of the Sonic System, the Sonic restaurant chain, or any aspect thereof, including sales information, except that Licensee may provide information to attorneys, accountants, financial planners, and other professionals as required in the course of Licensee&#x2019;s personal business or the operation of the Sonic Restaurant.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ACCOUNTING AND RECORDS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Due Date.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;On or before the 10th day of each month, Licensee shall submit to Sonic a complete profit and loss statement in a form prescribed by Sonic and such statistical reports in such form as Sonic shall reasonably require from time to time, for the previous month immediately ended, or for such other time period as may be designated by Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such profit and loss statements and other statistical and financial reports required by this Agreement shall be submitted by electronic means as specified by Sonic.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Record Retention
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall keep and preserve full and complete records of the Sonic Restaurant business for at least three years in a manner and form satisfactory to Sonic and shall also deliver such additional financial, operating, and other information and reports as Sonic may reasonably request on the forms and in the manner prescribed by Sonic; provided, however, that Licensee shall maintain, at a minimum, those books and records required to be kept by the Internal Revenue Service under the Internal Revenue Code for purposes of its regulation of Licensee&#x2019;s business and make the same books available to Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Charitable Contributions and Discounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In meeting the requirements set forth in Sections 10.01 and 10.02 above, Licensee shall keep records substantiating and enter as a line item on its financial statements amounts representing the valuation for goods (whether food, paper, or otherwise) which constitute charitable contributions to third parties from the same goods out of the Sonic Restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;Likewise, the Licensee shall maintain records and enter on its financial statements (particularly a line item on its profit and loss statement) information representing the value or amount of sales represented by coupons traded with and discounts granted by the Licensee at the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Annual Reports
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee further agrees to submit, within 90 days following the close of each fiscal year of the Sonic Restaurant&#x2019;s operation, a profit and loss statement covering operations during such fiscal year and the balance sheet taken as of the close of such fiscal year.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Audit by Sonic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. Sonic shall have the right to inspect and audit Licensee&#x2019;s accounts, books, records, and tax returns at all times during and after the term of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;If such inspection discloses that Gross Sales actually exceeded or, pursuant to generally accepted audit methodologies, should have exceeded the amount reported by Licensee, Licensee shall immediately pay Sonic:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) the additional royalty fee, brand fee, technology fee and advertising expenditures; (ii) interest on all unpaid amounts (from the original due date) at a rate equal to that provided by Section 5.05 herein; and (iii) a 10% surcharge on all unpaid amounts.&nbsp;&nbsp;If such inspection discloses that Gross Sales actually exceeded or, pursuant to generally accepted audit methodologies, should have exceeded the amount reported by Licensee as Licensee&#x2019;s Gross Sales by an amount equal to 3% or more of the Gross Sales originally reported to Sonic, Licensee shall bear the cost of such inspection and audit at rates and fees customarily charged by Sonic for such auditing and inspecting services and duties.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unpaid brand fees, including interest and surcharges collected by Sonic pursuant to this section, shall be used in accordance with the expenditures authorized by Section 5.03; nevertheless, Sonic may, on a case by case basis, at Sonic&#x2019;s sole discretion, use such collected amounts in accordance with the expenditures authorized by Section 11.01.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall have the right to bring an action in its own name to collect unpaid brand and advertising expenditures required by Section 11 herein.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Third-Party Audit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic has reason to believe that the Licensee may not have reported all of its Gross Sales, Sonic may require the Licensee to have its profit and loss statement and balance sheet certified by an independent public accountant.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall at his expense cause a Certified Public Accountant to consult with
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	17
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage93"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic concerning such statement and balance sheet.&nbsp;&nbsp;The original of each such reports required by this Section 10.06 shall be mailed to Sonic&#x2019;s business office at the address designated in Section 19 below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.07.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Licensee&#x2019;s Failure to Timely Deliver Financial Records
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Licensee fails to timely provide Sonic with complete profit and loss statements, accounts, books, records, and tax returns pertaining to the Sonic Restaurant business, or fails to fully cooperate with Sonic&#x2019;s audit of the Sonic Restaurant business, Sonic shall have the right to estimate Licensee&#x2019;s Gross Sales for the Sonic Restaurant using information available on the Sonic Restaurant or other Sonic drive-in restaurants.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee agrees to accept Sonic&#x2019;s estimates as conclusively correct until Licensee fully complies with Sonic&#x2019;s accounting and disclosure requirements under this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, if the Licensee&#x2019;s subsequent accounting and disclosures reveal that Licensee under-reported Gross Sales or underpaid fees due under this Agreement, Sonic may recover all deficiencies and may litigate claims of fraud even though Sonic may have already obtained a judgment using Sonic&#x2019;s estimates.&nbsp;&nbsp;Furthermore, nothing in this Agreement or any judgment using estimates shall prevent or hinder Sonic&#x2019;s further efforts and rights to obtain the accounting and disclosures which Licensee is required to give to Sonic under this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Without regard to whether Licensee fails to timely provide records to Sonic or fails to fully cooperate with Sonic in the audit of the Sonic Restaurant, Sonic may make estimates during the audit process or for other purposes as allowed by generally accepted accounting principles or audit methodologies.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.08.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Financial Disclosure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall have the right to assemble and disseminate to third parties financial and other information regarding the Licensee and other licensees of Sonic to the extent required by law or to the extent necessary or appropriate to further the interests of the Sonic System as a whole.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall have the right to disclose the business name, address, and telephone number of the Licensee as they appear in Sonic&#x2019;s records to any Person making inquiry as to the ownership of the Sonic Restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall not disclose specific financial information regarding the Licensee or the Sonic Restaurant to any Person without (a) the Licensee&#x2019;s prior, written consent or (b) being directed to disclose the information pursuant to the order of a court or other governmental agency.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.09.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Accounting Services
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that Licensee is late three or more times during any 12-month period in paying any fee or obligation required by this Agreement, including the royalty fees set forth in Section 5.02 and the brand and advertising expenditures set forth in Sections 5.03 and 11, Sonic shall have the right to require Licensee to use Sonic&#x2019;s accounting services for the term of this Agreement and any renewal, for which cost Licensee shall reimburse Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;This requirement is in addition to all other rights Sonic may have under the terms of this Agreement and otherwise.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.10.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Application of Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Despite any payment designation by Licensee, Sonic may apply any payments received from Licensee pursuant to this Agreement to the oldest debt or in accordance with any payment application process prescribed by Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	ADVERTISING AND BRAND EXPENDITURES
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Standard Programs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Recognizing the value of advertising and the importance of the standardization of advertising and brand programs to the furtherance of the goodwill and public image of the System, the parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the event the Sonic Restaurant lies within a DMA for which a Sonic-approved advertising cooperative has been formed, Licensee (i) shall join such advertising cooperative or such other advertising cooperative as may be designated by Sonic; (ii) shall abide by, follow, support, and promote the financial accounting requirements established by Sonic from time to time for advertising cooperatives, including complying with the format of financial reporting required by Sonic, acknowledging Sonic&#x2019;s right to audit the advertising cooperative, cooperating fully with Sonic in the event of any such audit, and using either the cooperative accounting services of Sonic or another Sonic-approved accounting service; (iii) shall support the adoption of only those bylaws approved by Sonic for the advertising cooperative; and (iv) shall not purchase media outside of the advertising cooperative.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall contribute to such advertising cooperative an amount required by such advertising cooperative on a schedule required by such advertising cooperative, provided that such contributions shall occur no less often than each calendar month and shall be of an amount not less than 3.25% of Licensee&#x2019;s Gross Sales from the Sonic Restaurant during each partial or full calendar month.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the DMA has, in Sonic&#x2019;s sole discretion, been designated a &#x201C;developing market,&#x201D; Licensee shall instead contribute to the advertising cooperative not less than 5% of Licensee&#x2019;s
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage94"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Gross Sales from the Sonic Restaurant during each partial or full calendar month; however, at any time Sonic may alternatively designate other uses for any portion of such developing market contribution if Sonic determines, in its sole discretion, that there is less need for advertising and a greater need for another use.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the event there exists no Sonic-approved advertising cooperative in the DMA in which the Sonic Restaurant is located, Licensee shall promptly form an advertising cooperative for the DMA and further comply with the requirements set forth in Sections 11.01(a) and 11.01(c) and other provisions of this Agreement applicable to and related to advertising cooperatives.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic or its designee shall maintain and administer a marketing fund for the Sonic System titled the System Marketing Fund (the &#x201C;SMF&#x201D;) as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The SMF shall be administered by Sonic, and funds paid to the SMF shall be deposited in a separate bank account denoted as the System Marketing Fund.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The advertising cooperative of which Licensee is a member shall pay to the SMF a sum equal to 2% of Licensee&#x2019;s Gross Sales (or higher as may be prescribed by Sonic) from the contribution paid by Licensee to the advertising cooperative.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic shall direct all marketing programs with sole discretion over the creative concepts, materials, and media used in such programs.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee acknowledges that Sonic and its designees undertake no obligation in administering the SMF to make expenditures for Licensee which are equivalent or proportionate to Licensee&#x2019;s contribution.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The SMF is intended to complement local marketing efforts by promoting the message of the Sonic brand to an expanded audience.&nbsp;&nbsp;The SMF and all earnings thereof shall be used primarily to purchase national broadcast, print, interactive, and other media, sponsorships, and brand enhancement opportunities.&nbsp;&nbsp;The SMF and its earnings shall not inure to the benefit of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The SMF is not an asset of Sonic, and an independent certified public accountant designated by Sonic shall review the operation of the SMF annually, and the report shall be made available to Licensee upon request.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the body approved and designated by the Sonic as the body to consult with regarding the Sonic&#x2019;s maintenance and administration of the SMF (such as the Franchise Advisory Council Executive Committee or its successor) may designate the independent public accountant to conduct the required review of the operation of the SMF if requested in writing at least 30 but not more than 60 days prior to the end of each fiscal year.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(vi)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Although Sonic intends the SMF to be of perpetual duration, Sonic maintains the right to terminate the SMF.&nbsp;&nbsp;The SMF shall not be terminated, however, until all monies in the SMF have been expended for marketing and promotional purposes as aforesaid.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(vii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On at least a quarterly basis, Sonic shall consult with the body approved and designated by Sonic (such as the Franchise Advisory Council Executive Committee or its successor) regarding Sonic&#x2019;s maintenance and administration of the SMF and shall report to that body on the SMF&#x2019;s operation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For purposes of determining the amount which the Licensee is required to contribute pursuant to Sections 11.01(a) and 5.03, above, for each calendar month which is the subject of review, the parties hereto agree that the preceding calendar month shall be used in determining the Gross Sales of the Sonic Restaurant to determine the contributions or expenditures required hereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;For example, to determine the contributions or expenditures required for February, the parties hereto agree that they will look to the preceding January&#x2019;s sales in order to determine the Gross Sales to determine the amount which must be contributed or expended by the Licensee under these Sections 11.01(a) and 5.03.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event the amounts required by Sections 11.01(a) and 5.03 are not paid in a timely fashion, Licensee shall pay Sonic in accordance with Section 10.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All advertising by Licensee in any medium which utilizes the Proprietary Marks or refers in any way to the Sonic Restaurant shall be conducted in a dignified manner and shall conform to such standards and requirements as Sonic may specify from time to time in writing.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall submit to Sonic (in accordance with
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	19
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage95"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the notice provisions contained herein), for Sonic&#x2019;s prior approval (except with respect to prices to be charged unless the terms of Section 6.05(c)(xxii) apply), samples of all advertising and promotional plans and materials that Licensee desires to use that use the Proprietary Marks or refer to the Sonic Restaurant and that have not been prepared or previously approved by Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;If written disapproval thereof is not received by Licensee within 15 days from the date of receipt by Sonic of such materials, Sonic shall be deemed to have given the required approval.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon notice from Sonic, Licensee shall discontinue and/or remove any objectionable advertising material, whether or not same was previously approved by Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;If said materials are not discontinued and/or removed within five days after notice, Sonic or its authorized agents, may, at any time, enter upon Licensee&#x2019;s premises, or elsewhere, and remove any objectionable signs or advertising media and may keep or destroy such signs or other media without paying therefore, and without being guilty of trespass or other tort.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic may offer from time to time to provide, upon terms subject to the discretion of Sonic, approved local advertising and promotional plans and materials, including, without limitation, newspaper display space and distributed promotional materials.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic or its designee shall maintain and administer a fund for the Sonic System titled the Sonic Brand Fund (the &#x201C;SBF&#x201D;) (formerly known as the Sonic Advertising Fund) as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As provided in Section 5.03 hereof, Licensee shall pay a brand contribution fee to the SBF, which shall be deposited in a separate bank account denoted as the Sonic Brand Fund.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic shall direct all brand programs with sole discretion over the concepts, materials, guidelines, and media used in such programs.&nbsp;&nbsp;The SBF is intended to enhance the Sonic System and maximize general public recognition and acceptance of the Proprietary Marks for the benefit of the System, and the Licensee acknowledges that Sonic and its designees undertake no obligation in administering the SBF to make expenditures for Licensee which are equivalent or proportionate to Licensee&#x2019;s contribution, and nothing in this Section 11.01 shall contravene the intent in Section 11.01(g)(iv).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The SBF and all earnings thereof shall be used exclusively to meet any and all costs of maintaining, administering, directing, and preparing advertising and other promotional programs (including, without limitation, the cost of preparing and conducting television, radio, magazine, and newspaper advertising campaigns and other public relations activities; employing advertising agencies to assist therein; and providing promotional brochures and other marketing materials to licensees in the Sonic System) as well as any other purpose that promotes, enhances, or protects the Sonic System including, but not limited to, food safety programs, customer feedback programs, and Sonic Games.&nbsp;&nbsp;All sums paid by licensees to the SBF shall be maintained in a separate account from the other funds of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;The SBF shall pay Sonic monthly an amount equal to 15% of the SBF&#x2019;s receipts during the preceding month, but not to exceed Sonic&#x2019;s actual administrative costs and overhead, if any, as Sonic may incur in activities reasonably related to the administration or direction of the SBF for the licensees and the Sonic System, including without limitation, conducting market research, preparing marketing, advertising, and other materials, and collecting and accounting for assessments for the SBF.&nbsp;&nbsp;The SBF and its earnings shall not inure to the benefit of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All materials produced by the SBF shall be made available to all licensees on a regular basis at less than full production cost but including the cost of distribution.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Section 11.01(g)(iv) shall not preclude Sonic from offering other materials not produced by the SBF upon terms subject to the discretion of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;(See Section 11.01(f).)
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The SBF is not an asset of Sonic, and an independent certified public accountant designated by Sonic shall review the operation of the SBF annually, and the report shall be made available to Licensee upon request.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the body approved and designated by Sonic as the body to consult with regarding Sonic&#x2019;s maintenance and administration of the SBF (such as the Franchise Advisory Council Executive Committee or its successor) may designate the independent public accountant to conduct the required review of the operation of the SBF, if requested in writing at least 30 but not more than 60 days prior to the end of each fiscal year.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	20

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage96"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(vi)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Although Sonic intends the SBF to be of perpetual duration, Sonic maintains the right to terminate the SBF.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such SBF shall not be terminated, however, until all monies in the SBF have been expended for purposes as aforesaid.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(vii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On at least a quarterly basis, Sonic shall consult with the body approved and designated by Sonic (such as the Franchise Advisory Council Executive Committee or its successor) regarding Sonic&#x2019;s maintenance and administration of the SBF and shall report to that body on the SBF&#x2019;s operation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Coupons created or developed by or for Licensee for use in promoting the Sonic Restaurant are subject to the provisions of Section 11.01(e).&nbsp;&nbsp;Additionally, such coupons shall conspicuously state (i) the location(s) where the coupons will be accepted and (ii) an expiration date.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall use its best efforts to ensure that coupons created or developed for the Sonic Restaurant or its market are not distributed outside the area of the Sonic Restaurant or its market.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Publicity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall have the right to photograph the Sonic Restaurant&#x2019;s exterior and/or interior, and the various foods served, and to use any such photographs in any of its publicity or advertising, and Licensee shall cooperate in securing such photographs and consent of Persons pictured.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:21PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	INSURANCE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Insurance Amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to opening or taking possession of the Sonic Restaurant, the Licensee shall acquire and thereafter maintain insurance from insurance companies acceptable to Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall determine the appropriate limits of liability insurance and shall also have the right to specify other forms of insurance, but Sonic shall require the following minimum amounts and policy forms of insurance:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee shall maintain statutory worker&#x2019;s compensation insurance and employer&#x2019;s liability insurance having a minimum limit of liability of the greater of $500,000 or the minimum amount otherwise required by applicable state law.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall accept participation in the Texas Sonic Employers Trade Association (&#x201C;TSETA&#x201D;) or in the non-subscriber program for Sonic drive-in restaurants located in Texas as long as Texas law does not require statutory worker&#x2019;s compensation insurance.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee shall maintain commercial general liability insurance, including bodily injury, property damage, products, personal, and advertising injury coverage, on an occurrence policy form having a minimum per occurrence and general aggregate limits of at least $1,000,000 per location.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee shall maintain non-owned automobile liability insurance having a minimum limit of $1,000,000.&nbsp;&nbsp;The automobile policy also shall provide coverage for owned automobiles if owned or leased in the name of the Licensee.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee shall maintain excess (umbrella) liability insurance having a minimum limit of $1,000,000 per occurrence / general aggregate per location.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee shall maintain business income interruption insurance with an endorsement providing for reimbursement for a minimum of 12 months to Sonic, any Sonic-administered fund, and the advertising cooperative of which the Licensee is a member, as applicable, for payments due under Sections 5.02, 5.03, 5.07, and 11.01 stemming from an event causing closure of the Sonic Restaurant for 48 hours or more.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic shall have the right to require the Licensee to increase the insurance specified above by giving the Licensee 60 days&#x2019; written notice in accordance with the notice provisions of this Agreement, and the Licensee shall comply no later than the first policy renewal date after that 60-day period.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic as Additional Insured
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall name Sonic and Sonic&#x2019;s subsidiaries and Affiliates as additional insureds and loss payees under the insurance policies specified in Sections 12.01(b), 12.01(c), 12.01(d), and 12.01(e), above, and under any insurance policy (including any employment practices liability insurance policy) that provides coverage for an event that could result in a lawsuit in which Sonic is named a defendant.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee&#x2019;s policies shall constitute primary policies of insurance with regard to other insurance, shall contain a
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	21
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage97"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	waiver of subrogation provision in favor of Sonic as it relates to the operation of the Sonic Restaurant, and shall provide for at least 30 days&#x2019; written notice to Sonic prior to their cancellation or amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	General Conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to opening or taking possession of the Sonic Restaurant and within 10 days of any request by Sonic, the Licensee shall furnish Sonic with certificates of insurance evidencing that the Licensee has obtained the required insurance in the form and amounts as specified above.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the Licensee shall deliver evidence of the continuation of the required insurance policies at least 30 days prior to the expiration dates of each existing insurance policy.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee at any time fails to acquire and maintain the required insurance coverage, Sonic shall have the right, at the Licensee&#x2019;s expense, to acquire and administer the required minimum insurance coverage on behalf of the Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, Sonic shall not have any obligation to assume the premium expense, and nothing in this Agreement shall constitute a guaranty by Sonic against any losses sustained by the Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic may relieve itself of all duties with respect to the administration of any required insurance policies by giving 10 days&#x2019; written notice to the Licensee.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:21PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	TRANSFER OF INTEREST
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Assignment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The rights and duties created by this Agreement are personal to Licensee, and Sonic has granted the License in reliance on the collective character, skill, aptitude, and business and financial capacity of Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s principals.&nbsp;&nbsp;Accordingly, except as may be otherwise permitted by this Section 13, neither Licensee nor any Person or entity with an interest in Licensee shall directly or indirectly, through one or more intermediaries, without Sonic&#x2019;s prior written consent, sell, assign, transfer, convey, give away, pledge, mortgage, or otherwise encumber any direct or indirect interest in the Agreement; any interest in Licensee, if Licensee is a partnership, joint venture, closely held corporation, limited liability company, or other business entity; or any interest which, together with other related previous simultaneous or proposed transfers, constitutes a transfer of Control of Licensee where Licensee is registered under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 or which is a trust.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any such purported assignment occurring by operation of law or without Sonic&#x2019;s prior written consent and pursuant to the terms of this Section 13, shall constitute a default of this Agreement by Licensee, and such purported assignment shall be null and void.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Death or Permanent Incapacity of Licensee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the death or permanent incapacity of Licensee, the interest of Licensee in the Agreement may be assigned either pursuant to the terms of Section 13.04 herein or to one or more of the following Persons:&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee&#x2019;s spouse, heirs, or nearest relatives by blood or marriage, subject to the following conditions:&nbsp;&nbsp;(1) If, in the sole discretion of Sonic, such persons shall be capable of conducting the Sonic Restaurant business in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Agreement, and (2) if such persons shall also execute an agreement by which they personally assume full and unconditional liability for and agree to perform all the terms and conditions of the Agreement to the same extent as the original Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that Licensee&#x2019;s heirs do not obtain the consent of Sonic as assignees of the Agreement, the personal representative of Licensee shall have the greater of 120 days or the completion of the probate of the Licensee&#x2019;s estate to dispose of Licensee&#x2019;s interest hereunder, which disposition shall be subject to all the terms and conditions for assignments under Section 13.04.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee&#x2019;s personal representative shall cooperate with Sonic to provide, in a timely manner, such documents as may be requested by Sonic, including without limitation Licensee&#x2019;s death certificate and estate documents, to assist Sonic to determine or confirm Licensee&#x2019;s assignees.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Assignment to Licensee&#x2019;s Corporation or Other Business Entity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic may, upon Licensee&#x2019;s compliance with the following requirements, consent to an assignment of the Agreement to a corporation whose shares are owned and Controlled by Licensee or to another business entity, such as a limited liability company, whose interests are owned and Controlled by Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such written materials shall be supplied to Sonic within 15 days after the request by Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall be newly organized, and its charter or equivalent organizational document shall provide that its activities are confined exclusively to operating the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall maintain stop transfer instructions against the transfer on Licensee&#x2019;s corporation&#x2019;s or other business entity&#x2019;s records of any securities or interests with any voting rights subject to the restrictions of Section 13 hereof, and shall issue no securities upon the face of which the following printed legend does not legibly and conspicuously appear.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage98"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The transfer of this stock is subject to terms and conditions of one or more license agreements with Sonic Franchising LLC or its affiliates.&nbsp;&nbsp;Reference is made to said license agreement(s) and the restrictive provisions of the Articles and By Laws of this corporation.&nbsp;&nbsp;By agreeing to receive these securities, the transferee hereby agrees to be bound by the terms of such agreements, articles, and by-laws.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At any time upon Sonic&#x2019;s request, Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall furnish Sonic with a list of all shareholders, partners, or members, as applicable, having an interest in Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity, the percentage interest of such shareholder, partner, or member, and a list of all officers and directors or managers in such form as Sonic may require.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The name of Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall not include any of the Proprietary Marks granted by the Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall not use any mark nor any name deceptively similar thereto in a public or private offering of its securities or other interest, except to reflect Licensee&#x2019;s corporation&#x2019;s or other business entity&#x2019;s license relationship with Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any prospectus or registration Licensee or Licensee&#x2019;s corporation would propose to use in such a public or private offering shall be submitted to Sonic within a reasonable time prior to the effective date thereof for the purpose of permitting Sonic to verify compliance with this requirement by Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s corporation.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Articles of Incorporation, By Laws, and all other documents governing Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall be forwarded to Sonic for approval.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such documents shall recite that the issuance and transfer of any interest in Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity are restricted by the terms of Section 13 of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Each shareholder, partner, or member, as applicable, of the Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall personally guarantee performance under this Agreement and shall be personally bound by the terms thereof.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any breach of this Agreement by Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall be deemed a breach of this Agreement by each shareholder, partner, or member, as applicable, of Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity and each shareholder, partner, or member, as applicable, shall be personally and fully liable and obligated by any and all such breaches.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee and Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall submit to Sonic, prior to any assignment hereunder, a shareholders, partners, or members agreement, as applicable, executed by the Board of Directors or managers, as applicable, and ratified by all shareholders, partners, or members, which states that, except as may be permitted by Section 13 of this Agreement, no shares of stock or other interest in Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall be issued, transferred, or assigned to any Person or entity without Sonic&#x2019;s prior written consent.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Each and every shareholder, partner, or member of Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity or any party owning a security issued by, or owning any legal or equitable interest in Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity or in any security convertible to a legal or equitable interest in Licensee&#x2019;s corporation or other business entity shall meet those same standards of approval as an individual licensee shall be required to meet prior to being included as a licensee on a standard license agreement with Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Assignment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to any assignments or contingent assignments contemplated by the terms of Sections 13.02 and 13.03, Licensee shall not sell, transfer, or assign the Agreement to any Person or Persons (including to another Licensee under this Agreement where more than one Person has executed this Agreement) without Sonic&#x2019;s prior written consent.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such consent shall not be unreasonably withheld.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In determining whether to grant or to withhold such consent, the following requirements must be met by Licensee:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All of Licensee&#x2019;s accrued monetary obligations shall have been satisfied whether due under this Agreement or otherwise.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

	23

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

	&nbsp;
