<A NAME="eolPage99"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic and the Licensee execute a general release of each other, in a form satisfactory to Sonic, of any and all claims the Licensee may have against Sonic and its Affiliates, including (without limitation) all claims arising under any federal, state, or local law, rule, or ordinance, but excluding (as to Sonic) any claims against the Licensee for (a) unpaid moneys due Sonic, its Affiliates, or Sonic-approved advertising cooperatives, (b) the violation of the legal rights of Sonic or its Affiliates regarding the Proprietary Marks, (c) the violation of any of the covenants contained in Section 16.01 of this Agreement, (d) the violation of any duty under this Agreement to insure, defend, or indemnify Sonic or its Affiliates or to hold Sonic or its Affiliates harmless, and (e) the violation of any other agreement with Sonic or its Affiliates.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic may waive the requirements of this Section 13.04(b)(ii) at Sonic&#x2019;s election.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall not be in material breach of this Agreement or any other agreement between Sonic and Licensee.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Assignee (or the assignee&#x2019;s management, as the case may be) shall at Sonic&#x2019;s sole discretion enroll in and successfully complete such training programs as Sonic shall at that time designate according to Section 6.04 hereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic shall consider of each prospective transferee, by way of illustration, the following:&nbsp;&nbsp;(a) work experience and aptitude, (b) financial background, (c) character, (d) ability to personally devote full time and best efforts to managing the Sonic Restaurant, (e) residence in the locality of the Sonic Restaurant, (f) equity interest in the Sonic Restaurant, (g) conflicting interests, and (h) such other criteria and conditions as Sonic shall apply in the case of an application for a new license to operate a Sonic drive-in restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic&#x2019;s consent shall also be conditioned upon such transferee&#x2019;s execution of an agreement by which transferee personally assumes full and unconditional liability for and agrees to perform from the date of such transfer all obligations, covenants, and agreements contained in this Agreement to the same extent as if transferee had been an original party to the Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;At Sonic&#x2019;s election, Sonic may alternatively allow such transferee to sign the then-current form of license agreement for Sonic drive-in restaurants subject to all terms, conditions, obligations, and covenants contained in that form of license agreement, including the full term of that license agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Following License&#x2019;s sale, assignment, or transfer of this Agreement, Licensee shall remain subject to Section 16.01 of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic&#x2019;s Right of First Refusal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;If Licensee or any Person or entity with an interest in Licensee has received and desires to accept any bona fide offer to purchase all or any part of Licensee&#x2019;s interest in this Agreement or in Licensee and the transfer of such interest would: (1) result in a change of Control of Licensee of this Agreement or (2) constitute a transfer of interest held by a Controlling Person of Licensee or of the Agreement, Licensee or such Person shall notify Sonic in writing of each such offer, with such notice including the name and address of the proposed purchaser, the amount and terms of the proposed purchase price, a copy of the proposed purchase contract (signed by the parties, but expressly subject to Sonic&#x2019;s right of first refusal), and all other terms and conditions of such offer.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall have the right and option, exercisable within 20 days after Sonic&#x2019;s receipt of such written notification, to send written notice to Licensee or such Person or entity that Sonic or its designee intends to purchase the interest which is proposed to be transferred on the same terms and conditions offered by the third party, provided that Sonic has the right to substitute cash for any consideration offered by the third party.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any material change in the terms of an offer prior to closing shall cause it to be deemed a new offer, subject to the same right of first refusal by Sonic or its designee as in the initial offer; provided, however, that such new offer shall not affect Sonic&#x2019;s right and option, within 20 days of notice to Sonic of the initial offer, to provide notice of its intent to purchase the interest on the terms and conditions in the initial offer.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic&#x2019;s failure to exercise its option shall not constitute a waiver of any other provision of this Agreement, including any of the requirements of this Section 13 with respect to the proposed transfer.&nbsp;&nbsp;Silence on the part of Sonic shall constitute rejection.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the proposed sale includes assets of Licensee not related to the operation of a licensed Sonic drive in restaurant, Sonic may purchase not only the assets related to the operation of a licensed Sonic drive in restaurant, but may also purchase the other assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;An equitable purchase price shall be allocated to each asset included in the proposed sale.&nbsp;&nbsp;In any purchase by Sonic pursuant to this Section 13(a), Sonic shall have the right to require the seller to make customary representations and warranties.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	24
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage100"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The election by Sonic not to exercise its right of first refusal as to any offer shall not affect its right of first refusal as to any subsequent offer.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any sale or attempted sale effected without first giving Sonic the right of first refusal described above shall be void and of no force and effect.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Sonic does not accept the offer to purchase the Sonic Restaurant, Licensee may conclude the sale to the purchaser who made the offer so long as the terms and conditions of such sale are identical to those originally offered to Sonic; provided, however, that Sonic&#x2019;s approval of the assignee be first obtained, which consent shall not be unreasonably withheld upon compliance with the conditions on assignment imposed by this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The provisions of this Section 13.05 shall not apply to any proposed transfers to members of the Licensee&#x2019;s immediate family.&nbsp;&nbsp;For the purposes of this Section 13.05, a member of the Licensee&#x2019;s immediate family shall mean the Licensee&#x2019;s spouse, children (by birth or adoption), and stepchildren.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the provisions of this Section 13.05 shall not apply to any proposed transfers to a Person who already owns an interest (directly or indirectly) in this Agreement as long as the transfer will not result in a change in Control of the Licensee or the Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Consent to Assignments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;With regard to any transfer, assignment, or pledge of any interest in this Agreement or in the Licensee pursuant to the foregoing provisions of this Section 13, Sonic shall not withhold its consent unreasonably as long as the proposed transfer, assignment, or pledge otherwise complies with the other requirements set forth in this Section 13.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:21PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	14.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	DEFAULT AND TERMINATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	14.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Optional Termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall be deemed to be in breach of this Agreement and Sonic may, at its option, terminate this Agreement and all rights granted herein at any time during the term hereof without affording Licensee any opportunity to cure the breach, effective immediately upon Licensee&#x2019;s receipt of a notice of termination, upon the occurrence of any of the following events:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall become insolvent.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee, either personally, through an equity owner, or through Licensee&#x2019;s attorney, shall give oral or written notice to Sonic of Licensee&#x2019;s intent to file a voluntary petition under any bankruptcy law.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A final judgment aggregating in excess of $5,000 against the Sonic Restaurant or property connected with the Sonic Restaurant which remains unpaid for thirty days.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Suit to foreclose any lien against any assets of the Sonic Restaurant is instituted against Licensee and (i) is not dismissed within 30 days, (ii) such lien is not contested and challenged through the applicable administrative agencies or courts, or (iii) a bond is not posted (if such remedy is available) to delay any such foreclosure and guarantee performance.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The assets of the Sonic Restaurant are sold after being levied thereupon by sheriff, marshal, or a constable.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Transfer of this Agreement, in whole or in part, is effected in any manner inconsistent with Section 13 hereof.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The assets, property, or interests of Licensee are blocked under any law, ordinance, or regulation relating to terrorist activities or Licensee is otherwise in violation of any such law, ordinance, or regulation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee ceases to operate the Sonic Restaurant or otherwise abandons the Sonic Restaurant (other than closure permitted pursuant to Section 6.05(c)(vi) herein) or forfeits the legal right to do or transact business at the location licensed herein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	25
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage101"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee is convicted of a felony, a crime involving moral turpitude, or any other crime or offense that is reasonably likely, in the sole opinion of Sonic, to adversely affect the Sonic System, the Proprietary Marks, the goodwill associated therewith, or Sonic&#x2019;s rights therein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(j)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee misuses or makes any unauthorized use of any of the Proprietary Marks or any other identifying characteristic of the Sonic System or otherwise materially impairs the goodwill associated therewith or Sonic&#x2019;s rights therein, and the Licensee will not or cannot cure the default within 30 days.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(k)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee improperly discloses trade secrets or confidential information, and the Licensee will not or cannot cure the default within 30 days.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(l)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If continued operation of the Sonic Restaurant might endanger public health or safety.&nbsp;&nbsp;In such case, whether or not Sonic elects to terminate this Agreement, Sonic may immediately close the Sonic Restaurant unless and until the situation is, in Sonic&#x2019;s judgment, satisfactorily resolved.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(m)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee knowingly or through gross negligence maintains false books or records or knowingly or through gross negligence submits any false report to Sonic.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(n)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee is in default of this Agreement three or more times in any given 12-month period, whether or not such default is cured.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	14.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Period to Cure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as provided in Section 14.01, Licensee shall have 30 days after receipt from Sonic of a written notice of breach of this Agreement or such notice period as is required by the law of the state where the Sonic Restaurant is located, within which to remedy any breach hereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, this period to cure will not be available to Licensee, and Sonic will not be required to delay termination of this Agreement, where the breach involved is one which Licensee cannot cure within the prescribed cure period or is one which is impossible to cure.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall be in breach hereunder for any failure to comply with any of the terms of this Agreement or to carry out the terms of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such breach shall include, but shall not be limited to, the occurrence of any of the following illustrative events:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If the Licensee or Persons Controlling, Controlled by, or under common Control with Licensee fail to pay any past due amounts owed to Sonic, whether for the Sonic Restaurant or otherwise.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee fails to promptly pay, or repeatedly delays the prompt payment of, undisputed invoices from Licensee&#x2019;s suppliers or in the remittance of rent and property tax as required in Licensee&#x2019;s lease.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee fails to maintain and operate the Sonic Restaurant in a good, clean, and wholesome manner or otherwise is not in compliance with the standards prescribed by the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;In such case, whether or not Sonic elects to terminate this Agreement, Sonic may immediately close the Sonic Restaurant unless and until the failure or noncompliance is cured.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee attempts to assign or transfer any interest in this Agreement in violation of Section 13 herein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee denies Sonic the right to inspect the Sonic Restaurant at reasonable times, which includes the right to photograph the interior and exterior of the Sonic Restaurant in its entirety.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee breaches any other requirement set forth in this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee, upon the destruction of the Sonic Restaurant, fails to rebuild the licensed premises and resume operation within a reasonable time (cessation of the business from a licensed premises shall not constitute default of this Agreement if caused by condemnation, expiration of a location lease pursuant to its terms at execution, or when failure to rebuild following destruction of the licensed premises is prohibited by law or the location lease).&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee&#x2019;s conduct or the operation of the Sonic Restaurant by Licensee, in Sonic&#x2019;s judgment, damages or threatens to damage the goodwill of the Sonic System or the Sonic brand.&nbsp;&nbsp;In such case, whether or not
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	26
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<A NAME="eolPage102"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic elects to terminate this Agreement, Sonic may immediately close the Sonic Restaurant unless and until the situation, in Sonic&#x2019;s judgment, is satisfactorily resolved.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee fails to correct any deficiency or unsatisfactory condition within the time period required by Section 6.05(b).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	14.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Resolution of Disputes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The following provisions shall apply to any controversy between the Licensee and Sonic (including an Affiliate of Sonic) and relating (a) to this Agreement (including any claim that any part of this Agreement is invalid, illegal, or otherwise void or voidable and any claim that a controversy is not subject to arbitration), (b) to the parties&#x2019; business activities conducted as a result of this Agreement, or (c) the parties&#x2019; relationship or business dealings with one another generally, including all disputes and litigation pending or in existence as of the date of this Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Negotiation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties first shall use their best efforts to discuss and negotiate a resolution of the controversy.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Mediation.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the efforts to negotiate a resolution do not succeed, the parties shall submit the controversy to mediation in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, by a mediation firm agreeable to the parties or by the American Arbitration Association, if the parties cannot agree.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Arbitration.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the efforts to negotiate and mediate a resolution do not succeed, the parties shall resolve the controversy by final and binding arbitration in accordance with the Rules for Commercial Arbitration (the &#x201C;Rules&#x201D;) of the American Arbitration Association in effect at the time of the execution of this Agreement and pursuant to the following additional provisions:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Applicable Law.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Federal Arbitration Act (the &#x201C;Federal Act&#x201D;), as supplemented by the Oklahoma Arbitration Act (to the extent not inconsistent with the Federal Act), shall apply to the arbitration.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Selection of Arbitrator.&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties shall select one arbitrator within 10 days after the filing of a demand and submission in accordance with the Rules.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Location of Arbitration.&nbsp;&nbsp;The arbitration shall take place in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, and the arbitrator shall issue any award at the place of arbitration.&nbsp;&nbsp;The arbitrator may conduct hearings and meetings at any other place agreeable to the parties or, upon the motion of a party, determined by the arbitrator as necessary to obtain significant testimony or evidence.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:13PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Scope of Proceeding.&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties shall conduct any arbitration proceeding and resolve any controversy on an individual basis only and not on a class-wide, multiple-party, or similar basis.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(v)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Enforcement of Award.&nbsp;&nbsp;The prevailing party shall have the right to enter the award of the arbitrator in any court having jurisdiction over one or more of the parties or their assets.&nbsp;&nbsp;The parties specifically waive any right they may have to apply to any court for relief from the provisions of this Agreement or from any decision of the arbitrator made prior to the award.&nbsp;&nbsp;The award of the arbitrator shall not have any precedential or collateral estoppel effect on any other controversy involving Sonic or its Affiliates.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Excluded Controversies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;At the election of Sonic or its Affiliate, the provisions of this Section 14.03 shall not apply to any controversies relating to any fee due Sonic or its Affiliate; any promissory note payments due Sonic or its Affiliate; or any trade payables due Sonic or its Affiliate as a result of the purchase of equipment, goods, or supplies.&nbsp;&nbsp;At the election of Sonic or its Affiliate, the provisions of this Section 14.03 also shall not apply to any controversies relating to the use and protection of the Proprietary Marks or the Sonic System, including (without limitation) Sonic&#x2019;s right to apply to any court of competent jurisdiction for appropriate injunctive relief for the infringement of the Proprietary Marks or the Sonic System.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	27
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage103"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Attorneys&#x2019; Fees and Costs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The prevailing party to the arbitration or litigation shall have the right to an award of its reasonable attorneys&#x2019; fees and costs incurred after the filing of the demand and submission, including a portion of the direct costs of any in-house legal staff reasonably allocable to the time devoted to the arbitration.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:21PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	OBLIGATIONS UPON TERMINATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effect of Termination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, Cancellation, or Expiration of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as otherwise authorized pursuant to the terms of any other license agreement between Sonic and the Licensee, the Licensee shall comply with the following provisions after the expiration or termination of this Agreement and the License:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee, upon any termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, shall promptly pay to Sonic and Sonic&#x2019;s subsidiaries any and all sums owed to them.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of termination for any breach by Licensee, such sums shall include all damages, costs, and expenses, including reasonable attorneys&#x2019; fees, incurred by Sonic as a result of the breach, which obligation shall give rise to and remain, until paid in full, a lien in favor of Sonic against any and all of the assets of the Sonic Restaurant owned by Licensee at the time of default.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Upon termination, cancellation, or expiration hereof for any reason, the License and all Licensee&#x2019;s rights hereunder shall terminate. Licensee shall not thereafter use or adopt any trade secrets disclosed to Licensee hereunder or any paper goods, emblems, signs, displays, menu housings, or other property on which Sonic&#x2019;s name or Proprietary Marks are imprinted or otherwise form a part thereof or any confusing simulations thereof.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall not otherwise use or duplicate the Sonic System or any portion thereof or assist others to do so. Licensee shall remove from the premises all signs, emblems, and displays identifying it as associated with Sonic or the Sonic System or which constitute or display any Proprietary Mark and shall also remove from the premises all menu housings and PAYS or other Sonic proprietary equipment.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee shall cease to use and shall return to Sonic all copies of the Sonic Operations Manual, instructions, or materials delivered to Licensee hereunder.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Upon termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, unless otherwise directed in writing by Sonic, Licensee shall change the exterior and interior design and the decor of said premises, including, but not limited to, changing the color scheme, and shall make or cause to be made such changes in signs, buildings, and structures (excluding major structural changes) as Sonic shall reasonably direct so as to effectively distinguish the same from its former appearance and from any other Sonic drive in restaurant unit, and if Licensee fails or refuses to comply herewith, then Sonic shall have the right to enter upon the premises where said business is being conducted without being guilty of trespass or any other tort for the purpose of making or causing to be made such changes required by Sections 15.01(b) or 15.01(c) at the expense of Licensee, which expense Licensee agrees to pay on demand.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Upon termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, in the event Licensee is the owner of the Sign, Sonic shall have an irrevocable option to purchase the Sign for its fair market value.&nbsp;&nbsp;In any event, Licensee shall not thereafter use any sign or panels displaying Sonic&#x2019;s name or Proprietary Marks or which primarily display the colors used in any other such sign at any other Sonic drive-in restaurant unit (see Section 15.04 for determining fair market value).&nbsp;&nbsp;Any agent, servant, or employee of Sonic may remove the Sign or any objectionable signs or advertising from the Sonic Restaurant without being guilty of trespass or other tort, and Licensee shall be liable for Sonic&#x2019;s costs plus attorneys&#x2019; fees for any interference therewith.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Upon termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, Licensee shall cease to hold Licensee out in any way as a licensee of Sonic or to do anything which would indicate any relationship between Licensee and Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Notwithstanding the provisions contained in this Section 15.01, Licensee shall be solely responsible for the cost of any removals or changes required by this Section 15.01.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee hereby releases Sonic and its agents, servants, and employees from and agrees to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Sonic and its agents, servants, and employees against any cost, damage, liability, or expense (including attorneys&#x2019; fees) arising out of or resulting from Licensee granting Sonic and its agents, servants, and employees access to the premises, including without limitation any cost, damage, liability, or expense arising out of the removal of any sign, equipment, fixture, personal property, or other property from the premises or modification of the premises pursuant to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The covenants set forth in this Section 15.01 shall survive the termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All rights, claims, and indebtedness which may accrue to Sonic prior to termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement shall survive termination, cancellation, or expiration and be enforceable by Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall complete all modifications required by this Section 15.01 within 30 days after this Agreement has been terminated or canceled or has expired.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee and Sonic agree that Sonic&#x2019;s damages resulting from a breach of this Section 15.01 are difficult to estimate or determine accurately.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event of such breach by Licensee of the provisions of this Section 15.01, Licensee, in addition to any and all other remedies available to Sonic herein and elsewhere, will pay Sonic double the royalty, brand, and advertising fees prescribed in this Agreement until Licensee satisfactorily de-identifies the restaurant premises in the manner prescribed by this Section.&nbsp;&nbsp;This payment shall constitute liquidated damages and shall not be construed as a penalty since such payment has been agreed to by Licensee and Sonic as reasonably representative of the actual damage sustained by Sonic in the event of such a breach.&nbsp;&nbsp;The liquidated damages shall start on the 31st day after this Agreement has been terminated or canceled or has expired.&nbsp;&nbsp;These liquidated damages shall not constitute either a waiver of Licensee&#x2019;s obligation to de-identify or a license to use the Proprietary Marks or the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;These remedies will be in addition to any other remedies Sonic may have hereunder or under federal or state law.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic&#x2019;s Option to Purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon termination, cancellation, or expiration hereof, Sonic shall have the right and option to purchase all or any patented, special, or unique Sonic restaurant equipment, menu housings, signs, menus, and supplies of Licensee at their fair market value (see Section 15.04 for determining fair market value).&nbsp;&nbsp;Such right or option of Sonic shall be exercised as provided in Section 15.02(b).&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic elects to exercise any option to purchase herein provided, it shall have the right to set off all amounts due from Licensee to Sonic and one-half of the cost of any appraisals against any payment therefor.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	In the case of termination by expiration, Sonic shall exercise Sonic&#x2019;s option contained in this Section 15.02 by giving Licensee written notice at least 30 days prior to expiration.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the case of termination for any other reason, Sonic shall exercise its option by giving Licensee written notice within 30 days after termination.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sonic&#x2019;s option hereunder is without prejudice to Sonic&#x2019;s rights under any security agreement held by Sonic or with respect to which Sonic may have a guarantor&#x2019;s or surety&#x2019;s subrogation interest.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic exercises this option, Sonic may pay any debt which Licensee owes to Sonic and shall remit any balance of the purchase price to Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;There shall be no allowance for goodwill.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sonic&#x2019;s Obligation to Purchase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, if Licensee desires to sell Licensee&#x2019;s unbroken inventory packages of approved imprinted items and supplies with Proprietary Marks to Sonic, excluding all food items, Sonic shall have the obligation to repurchase such items at Licensee&#x2019;s cost.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	If Licensee desires to sell such items to Sonic, Licensee shall, not later than 10 days after termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, give Sonic 10 days written notice of Licensee&#x2019;s election and, at the expiration of the 10 days notice period, deliver such items at Licensee&#x2019;s expense with an itemized inventory to the nearest Sonic drive in restaurant designated by Sonic. Sonic agrees to pay Licensee or credit Licensee&#x2019;s account within seven days after said delivery.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Fair Market Value Determination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the parties cannot agree on the fair market value of any item subject to an option to purchase in this Agreement within a reasonable time, one appraiser shall be designated by Sonic, one appraiser shall be designated by Licensee, and the two appraisers shall designate an independent appraiser, and the valuation of such third appraiser alone shall be binding.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic and the Licensee each shall pay one-half of the cost of any appraisals required pursuant to this Section 15.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	COVENANTS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restrictions on Licensee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee agrees and covenants as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	29
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage105"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the term of this Agreement, Licensee shall not directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries (i) engage in, (ii) acquire any financial or beneficial interest (including interests in corporations, limited liability companies, partnerships, trusts, unincorporated associations, joint ventures, or other business entities) in, (iii) loan money to, or (iv) become landlord of any restaurant business which has a menu similar to that of a Sonic drive-in restaurant (such as hamburgers, hot dogs, onion rings, and similar items customarily sold by Sonic drive-in restaurants) or which has an appearance similar to that of a Sonic drive-in restaurant (such as color pattern, use of canopies, use of speakers and menu housings for ordering food, or other items that are customarily used by a Sonic drive-in restaurant).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall not, for a period of 18 months after termination of this Agreement for any reason, directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries (i) engage in, (ii) acquire any financial or beneficial interest (including interests in corporations, limited liability companies, partnerships, trusts, unincorporated associations, joint ventures, or other business entities) in, (iii) loan money to, or (iv) become a landlord of any restaurant business which has a menu similar to that of a Sonic drive-in restaurant (such as hamburgers, hot dogs, onion rings, and similar items customarily sold by Sonic drive-in restaurants) or which has an appearance similar to that of a Sonic drive-in restaurant (such as color pattern, use of canopies, use of speakers and menu housings for ordering food, or other items that are customarily used by a Sonic drive-in restaurant), and which (i) is within a three-mile radius of the Sonic Restaurant formerly licensed by this Agreement, (ii) is within a 20-mile radius of any Sonic drive in restaurant in operation or under construction, or (iii) is located within the MSA of the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee shall not appropriate, use, or duplicate the Sonic System, or any portion thereof, for use at any other restaurant business.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the term of this Agreement, Licensee shall (i) use Licensee&#x2019;s best efforts to promote the business of the Sonic Restaurant, (ii) devote Licensee&#x2019;s full time, energies, and attention to the operation and management of the Sonic Restaurant, and (iii) not engage in any other business or activity that might detract from, interfere with, or be detrimental to the Sonic System or Licensee&#x2019;s full and timely performance under this Agreement (except the ownership and operation of other Sonic drive-in restaurants under license agreements with Sonic).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the term of this Agreement, Licensee shall not perform or provide services as a director, officer, employee, agent, representative, or consultant or in any other capacity for any other restaurant business which has a menu or appearance similar to that of a Sonic drive-in restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the term of this Agreement, Licensee shall not directly or indirectly through one or more intermediaries (i) engage in, (ii) acquire any financial or beneficial interest in, (iii) loan money to, or (iv) become landlord of any operation which has granted or is granting franchises or licenses (except for those granted by Sonic) to others to operate any other restaurant business which has a menu or appearance similar to that of a Sonic drive-in restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Sections 16.01(a), 16.01(b), and 16.01(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;shall not apply to ownership by Licensee of less than 2% beneficial interest in the outstanding equity securities of any corporation which is registered under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; however, this Section 16.01(g) shall apply to all shareholders, partners, or members of Licensee (in the event Licensee is a corporation, partnership, limited liability company, or other business entity) and all members of Licensee&#x2019;s and their immediate families, and all Persons or entities guaranteeing this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The parties agree that each of the foregoing covenants shall be construed as independent of any covenant or provision of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;If all or any portion of a covenant in this Section 16 is held unreasonable or unenforceable by an arbitrator, court, or agency having valid jurisdiction in an unappealed final decision to which Sonic is a party, Licensee expressly agrees to be bound by any lesser covenant subsumed with the terms of such covenant that imposes the maximum duty permitted by law, as if the resulting covenant were separately stated in and made a part of this Section 16.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee understands and acknowledges that Sonic shall have the right, in Sonic&#x2019;s sole discretion, to reduce the scope of any covenant set forth in Sections 16.01(a), 16.01(b), and 16.01(f), or any portion thereof, without Licensee&#x2019;s consent effective immediately upon receipt by Licensee of written notice thereof, and Licensee
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	30

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
