	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage106"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	agrees that it shall comply forthwith with any covenant as so modified, which shall be fully enforceable notwithstanding the provisions of Section 16.01(k).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(j)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee expressly agrees that the existence of any claims Licensee may have against Sonic, whether or not arising from this Agreement, shall not constitute a defense to the enforcement by Sonic of the covenants in this Section 16.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(k)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Licensee acknowledges that Licensee&#x2019;s violation of the terms of this Section 16 would result in irreparable injury to Sonic for which no adequate remedy at law is available, and Licensee accordingly consents to the ex parte issuance of restraining orders, temporary and permanent injunctions, and cease and desist orders prohibiting any conduct by Licensee in violation of the terms of this Section 16.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Covenants by Others
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;At the time of execution of this Agreement, Licensee shall obtain covenants similar in substance to those set forth in this Section 16 (including covenants applicable upon the termination of a Person&#x2019;s relationship with Licensee) from all officers, directors, and holders of a direct or indirect beneficial ownership interest in Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;With respect to each Person who becomes associated with Licensee in one of the capacities enumerated above subsequent to execution of this Agreement, Licensee shall require and obtain such covenants.&nbsp;&nbsp;In no event shall any Person enumerated be granted access to any confidential aspect of the Sonic System or the Sonic Restaurant prior to execution of such a covenant.&nbsp;&nbsp;All covenants required by this Section 16.02 shall include, without limitation, specific identification of Sonic as a third-party beneficiary of such covenants with the independent right to enforce them.&nbsp;&nbsp;Failure by Licensee to obtain execution of a covenant required by this Section 16.02 shall constitute a breach of this Agreement. Licensee shall furnish to Sonic executed copies of such covenants within 10 days of such request by Sonic.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:21PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	INDEPENDENT CONTRACTOR &amp; INDEMNIFICATION
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Licensee not an Agent of Sonic; Employment Matters
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;It is understood and agreed that this Agreement does not create a fiduciary relationship between Sonic and Licensee, and that nothing herein contained shall constitute Licensee as the agent, legal representative, partner, joint venturer, or employee of Sonic. Licensee is, and shall remain, an independent contractor responsible for all obligations and liabilities of, and for all loss or damage to, the Sonic Restaurant and its business, including any personal property, equipment, fixtures, or real property connected therewith and for all claims or demands based on damage or destruction of property or based on injury, illness, or death of any person or persons, directly or indirectly, resulting from the operation of the Sonic Restaurant.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee&#x2019;s responsibility for the Sonic Restaurant and its business shall include responsibility for all of the employment matters (including employment decisions) of the Sonic Restaurant and for compliance with federal, state, and local laws and regulations relating to such employment matters.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic will refer all complaints related to employment matters of the Sonic Restaurant to Licensee for resolution, and the indemnification and hold harmless provisions of Section 17.03 shall apply to all employment matters of the Sonic Restaurant.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cost of Enforcement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates become involved in any action at law or in equity or in any proceeding opposing Licensee to secure, enforce, protect, or defend Sonic&#x2019;s or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates&#x2019; rights and remedies under this Agreement, in addition to any judgment entered in their favor, Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates, as applicable, shall be entitled to demand of and (in the event Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates, as applicable, prevail in such actions or proceedings) recover from Licensee the reasonable costs, expenses, and attorneys&#x2019; fees incurred by Sonic or Sonic's Affiliates.&nbsp;&nbsp;If, in such applicable final judgment Sonic does not prevail, Licensee shall be entitled to recover from Sonic in any such action or proceeding the reasonable costs, expenses, and attorneys&#x2019; fees incurred by Licensee. Licensee&#x2019;s responsibility for the Sonic Restaurant and its business shall include responsibility for all of the employment matters (including employment decisions) of the Sonic Restaurant and for compliance with federal, state, and local laws and regulations relating to such employment matters.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	17.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates shall be subject to any claim, demand, or penalty or become a party to any suit or other judicial or administrative proceeding by reason of any claimed act or omission by Licensee or Licensee&#x2019;s employees or agents, or by reason of any act occurring on the Sonic Restaurant premises, or by reason of any act or omission with respect to the business or operation of the Sonic Restaurant, Licensee shall indemnify and hold Sonic and Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates harmless against all judgments, settlements, penalties, and expenses, including attorneys&#x2019; fees, court costs, and other expenses of litigation or administrative proceeding, incurred by or imposed on Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates in connection with the investigation or defense relating to
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	such claim or litigation or administrative proceeding and, at the election of Sonic, Licensee shall also defend Sonic and Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall not have any obligation to indemnify, defend, or hold harmless Sonic or any other Person pursuant to the provisions of this Section 17.03 to extent the obligation arises predominantly as a proximate result of Sonic&#x2019;s act or failure to act when under a duty to act.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	19.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Delivery
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any notice required hereunder, if not specified, shall be in writing and shall be delivered by (i) personal service, (ii) by overnight, receipted delivery service, (iii) by United States certified or registered mail, with postage prepaid, addressed to Licensee at the Sonic Restaurant or at such other address of Licensee then appearing on the records of Sonic or to Sonic addressed to the attention of Sonic&#x2019;s General Counsel at 300 Johnny Bench Drive, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma 73104, or at the subsequent address of Sonic&#x2019;s corporate headquarters.&nbsp;&nbsp;Either party, by a similar written notice, may change the address to which notices shall be sent. Notice shall be deemed effective on the date of delivery, if delivery is by personal service or overnight delivery, or three business days after the party places the notice in the United States mail, if delivery is by certified or registered mail.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	19.02.

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Failure to Accept
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Sonic is unable to give actual notice of any breach or termination of this Agreement because Licensee has failed to provide Sonic with a current address, because Licensee fails to accept or pick up this mailed notice, or due to any reason which is not the fault of Sonic, then such notice shall be deemed as given when Sonic sends such notice by overnight receipted delivery service or registered or certified mail, postage prepaid.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	19.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Licensee&#x2019;s Principal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee has designated on the first page of this Agreement a Principal to serve as the party receiving primary notice on behalf of the Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each Licensee hereby agrees that Sonic may send its notices and communications under this Agreement to the Principal provided for herein, that Sonic may use the Principal as its primary contact for purposes of communications and notices permitted or required hereunder, and that all communications and notices given by Sonic to the Principal will be just as effective on each Licensee as though the same had been given to each Licensee.
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Scope and Modification of Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;No interpretation, change, termination, or waiver of any of the provisions hereof shall be binding upon Sonic unless in writing signed by an officer of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;No modification, waiver, termination, rescission, discharge, or cancellation of this Agreement shall affect the right of any party hereto to enforce any claim or right hereunder, whether or not liquidated, which occurred prior to the date of such modification, waiver, termination, rescission, discharge, or cancellation.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The recitals shall be considered a part of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Section and Subsection captions are used only for convenience and are in no way to be construed as part of this Agreement or as a limitation of the scope of the particular Sections, Subsections, Paragraphs, and Subparagraphs to which they refer.&nbsp;&nbsp;Words of any gender used in this Agreement shall include any other gender, and words in the singular shall include the plural where the context requires.

	Scope of Protected Area

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Neither party to this Agreement intends to expand the scope of any covenants or commitments contained in Section 2 beyond the terms and provisions expressly stated in Section 2, and the parties to this Agreement agree that no Person, court, or arbitrator may interpret any of the foregoing covenants or commitments in Section 2 in that manner.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage108"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Invalidity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If any part of this Agreement for any reason shall be declared invalid, such decision shall not affect the validity of any remaining portion, which shall remain in full force and effect.&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event any material provision of this Agreement shall be stricken or declared invalid, Sonic reserves the right to terminate this Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21.04.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Binding Effect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement shall be binding upon the parties, and their heirs, executors, personal representatives, successors, and assigns.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Survival
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any provisions of this Agreement which impose an obligation after termination or expiration of this Agreement shall survive the termination or expiration of this Agreement and be binding on the parties.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Liability of Multiple Licensees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If Licensee consists of more than one Person or entity, each such Person and entity, and each proprietor, partner, member, and shareholder of each such entity, shall be jointly and severally liable for any and all of Licensee&#x2019;s obligations and prohibitions under this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Consequently, if and when a Person or entity as Licensee is in breach of this Agreement and fails or is unable to cure such breach in a timely manner, Sonic may terminate the rights of the so-affected Person or entity under this Agreement whereby this Agreement is terminated as to only such Person or entity while remaining fully effective as to all other Persons and entities remaining as Licensee on this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Person or entity removed as Licensee shall remain jointly and severally obligated with the Persons and entities remaining as Licensee for any and all obligations and liabilities of Licensee which occurred or accrued through the date of removal of said Person or entity.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:21PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	BUSINESS ENTITY LICENSEES
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Corporate, Partnership, and Limited Liability Company Licensees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee is a corporation, partnership, or limited liability company, the Licensee shall comply with the following provisions:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Purpose.&nbsp;&nbsp;The certificate of incorporation and bylaws, partnership agreement and certificate of limited partnership (if applicable), or articles of organization and operating agreement of the Licensee (collectively, &#x201C;Organizational Documents&#x201D;), as applicable, shall provide that the purpose of the business entity shall consist only in the development, ownership, operation, and maintenance of Sonic drive-in restaurants.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Transfer Restrictions.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Organizational Documents of the Licensee shall provide that the Licensee shall not issue any additional capital stock or interest of the Licensee and that no stockholder, partner, or member, as applicable, may transfer, assign, or pledge any issued capital stock or interest of the Licensee without the prior, written consent of Sonic, and each stock certificate, if applicable, issued to evidence the capital stock of the Licensee shall contain a legend disclosing the foregoing restriction.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall not withhold its consent to the issuance of additional capital stock or interest or a transfer, assignment, or pledge without a reasonable basis.&nbsp;&nbsp;In giving its consent, Sonic shall have the right (but not the obligation) to impose one or more reasonable conditions, including (without limitation) the requirement that the recipient of the capital stock or interest execute an agreement substantially similar to the Guaranty and Restriction Agreement attached as Schedule I to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Stockholder/Partner/Member Guaranty.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each stockholder, partner, or member of the Licensee, as applicable, shall execute the Guaranty and Restriction Agreement attached as Schedule I to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Documents.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to Sonic&#x2019;s execution of this Agreement, the Licensee shall deliver to Sonic copies of its Organizational Documents and issued stock certificates, as applicable, reflecting compliance with the provisions of this Section 22.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22.02.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Entity Licensee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee is any other form of business entity, the Licensee shall deliver to Sonic copies of its organizational documents containing provisions substantially similar to those required by Section 22.01.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	22.03.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Employee Stock Purchase Plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall have the right to transfer up to 49% of its outstanding capital stock or other equity interests to an employee stock purchase plan as long as one individual who qualifies as a licensee of Sonic for the Sonic Restaurant continues to own and Control, directly or indirectly, at least 51% of the Licensee&#x2019;s outstanding capital stock or other equity interests.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

	22.04
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Good Standing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the Licensee is a business entity, Licensee shall remain an active entity in good standing in its state of formation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	23.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	APPLICABLE LAWS; WAIVER OF JURY TRIAL; LIMITATIONS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The terms and provisions of this Agreement shall be interpreted in accordance with and governed by the laws of the State of Oklahoma, provided that if the laws of the State of Oklahoma would not permit full enforcement of Section 16 of this Agreement, then the laws of the state in which the Sonic Restaurant is located or Licensee is domiciled shall apply to the extent that any or all of such laws more fully permit enforcement of Section 16 of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as provided in Section 14.03, Licensee agrees that jurisdiction over Licensee exists and is proper within the county where the corporate headquarters of Sonic are located and within any and all courts, whether federal, state, or local, located within that county, and venue for any matter, claim, or cause of action relating to (a) this Agreement or any other agreement between Licensee and Sonic or Sonic&#x2019;s Affiliates, (b) the parties&#x2019; business activities conducted as a result of this Agreement, or (c) the parties&#x2019; relationship or business dealings with one another generally, including all disputes and litigation pending or in existence as of the date of this Agreement, shall only exist and is only proper within the same county where the corporate headquarters of Sonic are located and within any and all courts, whether federal, state, or local, located within that county.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee waives any and all defenses and objections, and Licensee agrees not to assert any defense or objection, to jurisdiction over Licensee and to venue as described hereinabove regarding any action, proceeding, or litigation instituted by Sonic against Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic and Licensee agree that any and all breaches of this Agreement, including breaches occurring after termination, cancellation, or expiration of this Agreement, shall be deemed to have occurred where the corporate headquarters of Sonic are located.&nbsp;&nbsp;SONIC AND LICENSEE WAIVE, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, THE RIGHT TO TRIAL BY JURY.&nbsp;&nbsp;SONIC AND LICENSEE ALSO WAIVE, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, ANY RIGHT TO OR CLAIM OF PUNITIVE OR EXEMPLARY DAMAGES AGAINST THE OTHER AND AGREE THAT, IN THE EVENT OF A DISPUTE BETWEEN THEM, EACH SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE RECOVERY OF ANY ACTUAL DAMAGES SUSTAINED BY IT.&nbsp;&nbsp;EXCEPT FOR CLAIMS ARISING FROM LICENSEE&#x2019;S NON-PAYMENT OR UNDERPAYMENT OF AMOUNTS LICENSEE OWES SONIC, ANY AND ALL CLAIMS ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THIS AGREEMENT OR SONIC&#x2019;S RELATIONSHIP WITH LICENSEE WILL BE BARRED UNLESS A JUDICIAL OR ARBITRATION PROCEEDING IS COMMENCED WITHIN ONE YEAR FROM THE DATE ON WHICH THE PARTY ASSERTING THE CLAIM KNEW OR SHOULD HAVE KNOWN OF THE FACTS GIVING RISE TO THE CLAIMS.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Initial Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The term of this Agreement is for a single 20-year term with no promise or representation as to the renewal of this Agreement or the grant of a new license except as provided herein.
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Consultation with Counsel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee hereby represents that Licensee has received a copy of this Agreement and has had an opportunity to consult with Licensee&#x2019;s attorney with respect thereto at least 10 days prior to Licensee&#x2019;s execution hereof.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee further represents that Licensee has had this Agreement in hand for review at least five business days prior to Licensee&#x2019;s execution hereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Licensee&#x2019;s Investigation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to the execution of this Agreement, Licensee has had ample opportunity to contact existing licensees of Sonic and to investigate all representations made by Sonic relating to the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee has conducted an independent investigation of the business contemplated by this Agreement and recognizes that it involves substantial business risks making the success of the venture largely dependent on the business abilities of the Licensee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic disclaims and the Licensee has not received from Sonic or its Affiliates any express or implied warranty or guaranty regarding the potential volume, profits, or success of the business venture contemplated by this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee has not relied on any express or implied warranty or guaranty from Sonic or its Affiliates regarding the potential volume, profits, or success of the business venture contemplated by this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	24.05.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Contrary Representations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee knows of no representations by Sonic or its Affiliates about the business contemplated by this Agreement which contradict the terms of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee has not
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	34

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	relied on any representations from Sonic or its Affiliates about the business contemplated by this Agreement which contradict the terms of this Agreement or the disclosures set forth in the Franchise Disclosure Document delivered to the Licensee in connection with the issuance of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	24.06.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Variances to Other Licensees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee understands that other developers and licensees may operate under different forms of agreements and, consequently, that Sonic&#x2019;s rights and obligations with regard to its various licensees may differ materially in certain circumstances.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	24.07.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Complete Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Agreement supersedes any and all other agreements or representations respecting the Sonic Restaurant and contains all the terms, conditions, and obligations of the parties with respect to the grant of this Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing in this Agreement or any related agreement is intended to disclaim the representations made in the Franchise Disclosure Document.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	25.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	INPUT AND ADVICE FROM LICENSEES
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In connection with the implementation of or significant changes in the programs or policies referred to in Sections 6.04, 6.05(c), 6.06, 8, 11.01(c), and 11.01(g) of this Agreement, Sonic shall solicit input and advice from a group of licensees gathered together for such purpose (whether established ongoing for such purpose or gathered on an ad hoc basis from time to time).&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic further shall use its best efforts to ensure that such groups are balanced in terms of geographic base, size of operating group, and period of tenure within the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, this Section 25 shall not have any effect unless the license agreements in effect for at least one-third of all Sonic drive-in restaurants contain this provision or a substantially similar provision.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	26.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	INJUNCTIVE RELIEF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee acknowledges that Sonic&#x2019;s remedy at law for any breach of (a) any of the Licensee&#x2019;s covenants under this Agreement (other than those involving only the payment of money), including the covenants contained in Section 16 of this Agreement; and (b) Sections 14.01(l), 14.02(c), 14.03(h), 15.01(b), 15.01(c), 15.01(d), and 15.01(e) of this Agreement, would not constitute an adequate remedy at law and, therefore, Sonic shall have the right to obtain temporary and permanent injunctive relief in any proceeding brought to enforce any of those provisions, without the necessity of proof of actual damages.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee acknowledges and expressly agrees that Sonic shall not be required to post any bond or other form of security in connection with any request for the issuance of injunctive relief, and Licensee expressly and unconditionally waives any requirement for the provision of security.&nbsp;&nbsp;Licensee also agrees that injunctive relief sought by Sonic and ordered by any court of competent jurisdiction shall be given full force and effect in any other jurisdiction, including the jurisdiction in which the Sonic Restaurant is located, and that Licensee will not oppose the enforcement of such relief.&nbsp;&nbsp;Nothing in this Section 26 shall prevent Sonic from pursuing separately or concurrently one or more of any other remedies available at law, subject to the provisions of Section 14.03 of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	27.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	GENERAL RELEASE AND COVENANT NOT TO SUE
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;THE LICENSEE HEREBY RELEASES SONIC, SONIC CORP., AND THEIR SUBSIDIARIES AND AFFILIATES, AND THE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AND AGENTS OF SONIC, SONIC CORP., AND THEIR SUBSIDIARIES AND AFFILIATES, FROM ANY AND ALL CLAIMS AND CAUSES OF ACTION, KNOWN OR UNKNOWN, WHICH MAY EXIST IN FAVOR OF THE LICENSEE AS OF THE DATE OF THIS AGREEMENT.&nbsp;&nbsp;IN ADDITION, THE LICENSEE COVENANTS THAT THE LICENSEE SHALL NOT FILE OR PURSUE ANY LEGAL ACTION OR COMPLAINT AGAINST ANY OF THE FOREGOING ENTITIES OR PERSONS WITH REGARD TO ANY OF THE FOREGOING CLAIMS OR CAUSES OF ACTION RELEASED PURSUANT TO THIS SECTION 27.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	BRAND TECHNOLOGY FUND
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic or its designee shall maintain and administer a fund for the Sonic System titled the Brand Technology Fund (the &#x201C;BTF&#x201D;) as follows:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	As provided in Section 5.07 hereof, Licensee shall pay a technology fee to the BTF, which shall be deposited in a separate bank account denoted as the Brand Technology Fund.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The BTF and all earnings thereof will be used exclusively to meet any and all costs of designing, developing, implementing, maintaining, administering and supporting products, services and programs related to technology and information systems for the Sonic System as well as any other purpose that enhances or protects the technology and information systems of any portion of the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;All sums paid to the BTF shall be maintained in a separate account from the other funds of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;The BTF shall pay Sonic monthly an amount equal
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	35
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to 15% of the BTF&#x2019;s receipts during the preceding month, but not to exceed Sonic&#x2019;s actual administrative costs and overhead, if any, as Sonic may incur in activities reasonably related to the administration or direction of the BTF for the licensees and the Sonic System.&nbsp;&nbsp;The BTF and its earnings shall not inure to the benefit of Sonic, and obligations of the BTF shall not be obligations of Sonic.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The BTF is not an asset of Sonic, and an independent certified public accountant designated by Sonic shall review the operation of the BTF annually, and the report shall be made available to Licensee upon request.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the foregoing, the body approved and designated by Sonic and the Franchise Advisory Council Executive Committee (or its successor) as the body to consult with regarding Sonic&#x2019;s maintenance and administration of the BTF may designate the independent public accountant to conduct the required review of the operation of the BTF, if requested in writing at least 30 days but not more than 60 days prior to the end of each fiscal year.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Licensee acknowledges that Sonic and its designees undertake no obligation in administering the BTF to make expenditures for Licensee which are equivalent or proportionate to Licensee&#x2019;s contribution to the BTF.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Although Sonic intends the BTF to be of perpetual duration, Sonic maintains the right to terminate the BTF.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such BTF shall not be terminated, however, until all monies in the BTF have been expended for purposes as aforesaid.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:25PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:16PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	On at least a quarterly basis, Sonic shall consult with the body approved and designated by Sonic and the Franchise Advisory Council Executive Committee (or its successor) regarding Sonic&#x2019;s maintenance and administration of the BTF and shall report to that body on the BTF&#x2019;s operation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Executed on the dates set forth below, to have effect as of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.
</FONT>

<TR>

<A NAME="eolPage113"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	GUARANTY AND RESTRICTION AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The undersigned (jointly and severally or individually, the &#x201C;Guarantor&#x201D;), Sonic Franchising LLC (&#x201C;Sonic&#x201D;), and&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(the &#x201C;Licensee&#x201D;) enter into this Guaranty and Restriction Agreement (this &#x201C;Guaranty&#x201D;) as of&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	W I T N E S S E T H:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Whereas, Sonic is entering into a license agreement (the &#x201C;License Agreement&#x201D;) dated the same date as this Guaranty with the Licensee for the Sonic Drive-In located at&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(the &#x201C;Drive-in&#x201D;); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Whereas, as a condition to entering into the License Agreement, Sonic has asked the Guarantor to provide a personal guaranty of all obligations of the Licensee Agreement; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Whereas, Sonic has also asked the Guarantor and the Licensee to agree to a restriction on the transfer of interests in the Licensee; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Whereas Sonic, the Guarantor, and the Licensee are willing to enter into those agreements based upon the terms and conditions of this Guaranty.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Now, therefore, in consideration of the mutual covenants set forth below and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which the parties hereby acknowledge, the parties agree as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Personal Guaranty of Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Guarantor hereby guarantees the prompt and full payment and performance of all obligations under the License Agreement including:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all royalties due Sonic pursuant to the License Agreement,
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all brand contribution fees to the Sonic Brand Fund pursuant to the License Agreement,
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all contributions to approved advertising cooperatives pursuant to the License Agreement,
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all technology fees to the Brand Technology Fund pursuant to the License Agreement,
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:7PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	any other obligations owing to Sonic or its Affiliates (as defined in the License Agreement) relating to the Drive-in, including any sign lease agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Nature of Guaranty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This guaranty shall constitute an absolute, unconditional, irrevocable, and continuing guaranty.&nbsp;&nbsp;Sonic shall not have any obligation to take any action against any other person or entity for collection of any payments prior to making any demand for payment or bringing any action against the Guarantor.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Permitted Actions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;From time to time, Sonic shall have the right to take, permit, or suffer to occur any &#x201C;Permitted Action,&#x201D; as defined below, without modifying, reducing, waiving, releasing, impairing, or otherwise affecting the obligations of the Guarantor under this Guaranty, without giving notice to the Guarantor or obtaining the Guarantor&#x2019;s consent, without the necessity of any reservations of rights against the Guarantor, and without liability on the part of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;As used in this Section 3, the phrase &#x201C;Permitted Action&#x201D; shall mean (a) an agreed extension of time for payment of any sum due under the License Agreement, (b) an agreed change in the manner or place of payment of any sums due under the License Agreement, (c) any waiver by Sonic of any defaults under the provisions of the License Agreement, (d) any delay or failure by Sonic to exercise any right or remedy Sonic may have under the License Agreement, (e) the granting by Sonic of any leniencies, waivers, extensions, and indulgences under the License Agreement, and (f) any agreed amendments to the License Agreement.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Waiver of Notices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Guarantor acknowledges and waives notice of Sonic&#x2019;s acceptance of the Guarantor&#x2019;s guaranty pursuant to the terms of this Guaranty.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Guarantor also waives any requirement that Sonic notify the Guarantor of any demands or enforcement actions by Sonic against the Licensee.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	CIF ___
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;

</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Restrictions on Transfer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Licensee shall not issue any additional shares of capital stock or other interest without the prior, written consent of Sonic.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Guarantor shall not transfer, assign, or pledge any of its shares of capital stock or other interest in the Licensee to any person without the prior, written consent of Sonic.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	6.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disputes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any dispute between the parties concerning this Guaranty will be resolved in accordance with the Resolution of Dispute provisions contained in the License Agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, if Sonic files suit to enforce the provisions of this Guaranty, venue shall only exist in the federal and state courts in Oklahoma, and such courts shall have personal jurisdiction over the Guarantor.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Guarantor expressly waives any and all objections as to venue in any of those courts and agrees that Sonic may serve process by mailing a copy of the summons by certified mail, return receipt requested, with sufficient postage prepaid, to the address of Guarantor as specified in this Guaranty.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	7.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Attorneys&#x2019; Fees, Costs, and Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In any action brought by Sonic to enforce the obligations of the Guarantor, Sonic shall also have the right to collect its reasonable attorneys&#x2019; fees, court costs, and expenses incurred in the action.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	8.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Headings
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The headings used in this Guaranty appear strictly for the parties&#x2019; convenience in identifying the provisions of this Guaranty and shall not affect the construction or interpretation of the provisions of this Guaranty.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:19PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	9.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Binding Effect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;This Guaranty binds and inures to the benefit of the parties and their respective successors, legal representatives, heirs, and permitted assigns.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	10.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Waiver
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The failure of a party to insist in any one or more instances on the performance of any term or condition of this Guaranty shall not operate as a waiver of any future performance of that term or condition.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:15PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	11.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Governing Law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the place where the parties execute this Guaranty, the internal laws of Oklahoma shall govern the construction of the terms and the application of the provisions of this Guaranty.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	12.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Amendments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;No amendments to this Guaranty shall become effective or binding on the parties unless agreed to in writing by all of the parties to be bound by the amendment.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	13.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Time constitutes an essential part of each and every part of this Guaranty.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	14.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as otherwise provided in this Guaranty, when this Guaranty makes provision for notice or concurrence of any kind, the sending party shall deliver or address the notice to the other party by certified mail, telecopy, or nationally-recognized overnight delivery service to the addresses shown on Exhibit &#x201C;A&#x201D; to this Guaranty.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	All notices pursuant to the provisions of this Guaranty shall run from the date that the other party receives the notice or three business days after the party places the notice in the United States mail.&nbsp;&nbsp;Each party may change the party&#x2019;s address by giving written notice to the other parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:14PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Release and Covenant Not To Sue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;THE GUARANTOR AND THE LICENSEE, AND EACH OF THEM, HEREBY RELEASE ALL CLAIMS AND CAUSES OF ACTION WHICH THE GUARANTOR OR THE LICENSEE, OR BOTH OF THEM, MAY HAVE AGAINST SONIC, SONIC CORP., AND THEIR SUBSIDIARIES AND AFFILIATES, AND THE STOCKHOLDERS, DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES, AND AGENTS OF SONIC, SONIC CORP., AND THEIR SUBSIDIARIES AND AFFILIATES.&nbsp;&nbsp;THE GUARANTOR AND THE LICENSEE, AND EACH OF THEM, FURTHER COVENANT NOT TO SUE ANY OF THE FOREGOING PERSONS OR ENTITIES ON ACCOUNT OF ANY OF THE FOREGOING CLAIMS OR CAUSES OF ACTION.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Executed and delivered as of the day and year first set forth above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#xFEFF;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Signatures on following page

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:43.06%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:15.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="SONC-20160831XEX10_01_HTM_TEXT105">
</A>
<A NAME="SONC-20160831XEX10_01_HTM_RANGE!B38">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fax
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</FONT>
